//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Casts Tornado
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Casts_Tornado_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSummonedUnit()) == 'ntor' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Casts_Tornado_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetSummonedUnit(), udg_Tornados)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Casts_Tornado takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Casts_Tornado=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Hero_Casts_Tornado, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SUMMON)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hero_Casts_Tornado, Condition(function Trig_Hero_Casts_Tornado_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_Casts_Tornado, function Trig_Hero_Casts_Tornado_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tornado Search
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tornado_Search_Func001Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Tornado_Search_Func001Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Tornado_Search_Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Tornado_Search_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tornado_Search_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Tornado_Search_Func001Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_Tornado_Search_Func001Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "move", udg_Point2)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

function Trig_Tornado_Search_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Tornados, function Trig_Tornado_Search_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tornado_Search takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tornado_Search=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Tornado_Search, 2)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Tornado_Search, function Trig_Tornado_Search_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Holy Light
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Holy_Light_Func001Func002Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func001Func002Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func001Func002Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func001Func002Func006Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func001Func002Func006Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func001Func002Func006Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func001Func002Func006Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func001Func002Func006Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func001Func002Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeHolyLight[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AHhb') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("holybolt") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Paladins) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Holy_Light_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Paladins)
        if ( Trig_Holy_Light_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Holy_Light_Func001Func002Func005002003))
            if ( Trig_Holy_Light_Func001Func002Func006C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "holybolt", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3))
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup4=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Holy_Light_Func001Func002Func006Func001002003))
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup4)
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "holybolt", udg_Unit2)
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup4)
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Holy_Light takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Holy_Light=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Holy_Light, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Holy_Light, function Trig_Holy_Light_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Divine Shield
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Divine_Shield_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hpal' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hart' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Huth' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Divine_Shield_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Divine_Shield_Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeDivineShield[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 20.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHds') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetTriggerUnit()) != String2OrderIdBJ("divineshield") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Divine_Shield_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Divine_Shield_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Divine_Shield_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "divineshield")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Divine_Shield takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Divine_Shield=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Divine_Shield, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Divine_Shield, Condition(function Trig_Divine_Shield_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Divine_Shield, function Trig_Divine_Shield_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Resurrection
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Resurrection_Func001Func003Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Resurrection_Func001Func003Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Resurrection_Func001Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitDeadBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Resurrection_Func001Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Resurrection_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeResurrection[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AHre') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Resurrection_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Paladins) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Resurrection_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Resurrection_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Paladins)
        if ( Trig_Resurrection_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Resurrection_Func001Func003Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Resurrection_Func001Func003Func004C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "resurrection")
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Resurrection takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Resurrection=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Resurrection, 2.75)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Resurrection, function Trig_Resurrection_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blizzard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeBlizzard[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AHbz') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AHbz', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHbz', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("tornado") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blizzard_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Archmages) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blizzard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Blizzard_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Archmages)
        if ( Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003))
                if ( Trig_Blizzard_Func001Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "blizzard", udg_Point2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blizzard takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blizzard=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Blizzard, 1.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Blizzard, function Trig_Blizzard_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Water Elemental
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Water_Elemental_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Hamg' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Haah' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Hgam' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Elemental_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Water_Elemental_Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeWaterElemental[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'AHwe') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetAttacker()) != String2OrderIdBJ("blizzard") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetAttacker()) != String2OrderIdBJ("tornado") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Elemental_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Water_Elemental_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Elemental_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "waterelemental")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Water_Elemental takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Water_Elemental=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Water_Elemental, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Water_Elemental, Condition(function Trig_Water_Elemental_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Water_Elemental, function Trig_Water_Elemental_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tornado
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tornado_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Hamg' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Haah' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Hgam' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Tornado_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Tornado_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeTornado[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetAttacker()) != String2OrderIdBJ("blizzard") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'ANto') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tornado_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "tornado", udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tornado takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tornado=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Tornado, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Tornado, Condition(function Trig_Tornado_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Tornado, function Trig_Tornado_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Storm Bolt
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("holybolt") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AHtb') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeStormBolt[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AHtb') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_MountainKings) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_MountainKings)
        if ( Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "thunderbolt", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup4=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003))
                if ( Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "thunderbolt", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup4))
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup4)
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Storm_Bolt takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Storm_Bolt=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Storm_Bolt, 2.10)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Storm_Bolt, function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Avatar and Thunder Clap
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Hmkg' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Hmbr' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func001Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func001Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func001Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func001Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func001Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func001Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func001Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeThunderClap[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'AHtc') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeAvatar[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHav', GetAttacker()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'AHav') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "avatar")
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
        if ( Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func001Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Func002Func001Func004C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "thunderclap")
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap, Condition(function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap, function Trig_Avatar_and_Thunder_Clap_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Avatar
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Avatar_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hmkg' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hmbr' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Avatar_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeAvatar[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHav', GetTriggerUnit()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHav') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Avatar_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Avatar_Func004002003))
    if ( Trig_Avatar_Func005C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "avatar")
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Avatar takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Avatar=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Avatar, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Avatar, Condition(function Trig_Avatar_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Avatar, function Trig_Avatar_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blood Mage Abilities

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005Func004002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005Func004002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005Func005Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005Func005Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005Func005Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005Func005Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSiphonMana[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHdr', udg_Unit) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("flamestrike") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AHdr') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AHdr', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHdr', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func006002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func006002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func006002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func006002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func006002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func007Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func007Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func007Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func007Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeBanish[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHbn', udg_Unit) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("flamestrike") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("drain") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AHbn') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AHbn', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHbn', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func006Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func006Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func006Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func006Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func006Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func006Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func006Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func006Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeFlamestrike[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHfs', udg_Unit) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("drain") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AHfs') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AHfs', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHfs', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activePhoenix[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHpx', udg_Unit) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("drain") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AHpx') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AHpx', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHpx', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_BloodMages) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_BloodMages)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        if ( Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "summonphoenix")
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
            if ( Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005C() ) then
                set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func005002003))
                if ( Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func006C() ) then
                    set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                    set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func006Func002002003))
                    if ( Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func006Func003C() ) then
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "flamestrike", udg_Point2)
                    else
                    endif
                    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            else
                if ( Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003C() ) then
                    set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func006002003))
                    if ( Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func007C() ) then
                        set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                        set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func007Func002002003))
                        if ( Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func007Func003C() ) then
                            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "banish", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3))
                        else
                            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "banish", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                        endif
                        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                    else
                    endif
                    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005C() ) then
                        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005Func004002003))
                        if ( Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005Func005C() ) then
                            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005Func005Func002002003))
                            if ( Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Func001Func003Func005Func003Func005Func005Func003C() ) then
                                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "drain", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3))
                            else
                                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "drain", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                            endif
                            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                        else
                        endif
                        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blood_Mage_Abilities takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blood_Mage_Abilities=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Blood_Mage_Abilities, 2.12)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Blood_Mage_Abilities, function Trig_Blood_Mage_Abilities_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Footman Defend
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Footman_Defend_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'hfoo' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'hhes' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'hcth' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nbel' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'njks' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Footman_Defend_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeDefend[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Footman_Defend_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Footman_Defend_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "defend")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Footman_Defend takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Footman_Defend=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Footman_Defend, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Footman_Defend, Condition(function Trig_Footman_Defend_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Footman_Defend, function Trig_Footman_Defend_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Priest Dispel Magic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bply') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003002002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003002002002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003002002002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003002002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bply') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bply') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))))))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) < UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) < UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) > UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) > UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func004002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func004002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func005Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_Unit2) != 'uplg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeDispelMagic[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Priests) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Priests)
        if ( Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "dispel", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func001002003))
                if ( Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                    set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "dispel", udg_Unit2)
                else
                    set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func001002003))
                    if ( Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func002C() ) then
                        set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3)
                        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "dispel", udg_Unit2)
                    else
                    endif
                    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
                set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(650.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func004002003))
                if ( Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func005C() ) then
                    set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                    if ( Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Func001Func002Func003Func005Func003C() ) then
                        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "dispel", udg_Unit2)
                    else
                    endif
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Priest_Dispel_Magic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Priest_Dispel_Magic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Priest_Dispel_Magic, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Priest_Dispel_Magic, function Trig_Priest_Dispel_Magic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Priest Inner Fire 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Binf') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Binf') == false), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Binf') == false), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func003Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Binf') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Binf') == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_Unit2) != 'ushd' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeInnerFire[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("dispel") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Priests) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Priests)
        if ( Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "innerfire", udg_Unit2)
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func003Func001002003))
                if ( Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                    set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                    if ( Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Func001Func002Func003Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "innerfire", udg_Unit2)
                    else
                    endif
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Priest_Inner_Fire_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Priest_Inner_Fire_2, 0.55)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Priest_Inner_Fire_2, function Trig_Priest_Inner_Fire_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sorceress Invisibility
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sorceress_Invisibility_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) < 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceress_Invisibility_Func001Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'hsor' )
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceress_Invisibility_Func001Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceress_Invisibility_Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'hsor'), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceress_Invisibility_Func001Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeInvisibility[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceress_Invisibility_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceress_Invisibility_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Sorceress) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceress_Invisibility_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Sorceress_Invisibility_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Sorceress_Invisibility_Func001Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_Sorceress_Invisibility_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            if ( Trig_Sorceress_Invisibility_Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "channel", GetTriggerUnit())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sorceress_Invisibility takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sorceress_Invisibility=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sorceress_Invisibility, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sorceress_Invisibility, Condition(function Trig_Sorceress_Invisibility_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sorceress_Invisibility, function Trig_Sorceress_Invisibility_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sorceress Sheep
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'hsor' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activePolymorph[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "polymorph", GetAttacker())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sorceress_Sheep takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sorceress_Sheep=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sorceress_Sheep, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sorceress_Sheep, Condition(function Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sorceress_Sheep, function Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sorceress Sheep 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Sorceress) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_2_Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_2_Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bply') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_2_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bply') == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_2_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activePolymorph[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Sorceress)
    if ( Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_2_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(650.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_2_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_2_Func002Func003C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "polymorph", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sorceress_Sheep_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sorceress_Sheep_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Sorceress_Sheep_2, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sorceress_Sheep_2, Condition(function Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sorceress_Sheep_2, function Trig_Sorceress_Sheep_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spellbreaker Control Magic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeControlMagic[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Spellbreaker) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Spellbreaker)
        if ( Trig_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic_Func001Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "controlmagic", udg_Unit2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic, 0.40)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic, function Trig_Spellbreaker_Control_Magic_Actions)
