//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragonhawk Rider Aerial Shackles
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'hdhw' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'nws1' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeAerialShackles[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'Amls') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'Bmlt') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "magicleash", GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles, Condition(function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles, function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragonhawk Rider Aerial Shackles 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2_Func001Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit2, 'Bmlt') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeAerialShackles[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'Amls') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DragonhawkRiders) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_DragonhawkRiders)
        if ( Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                if ( Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2_Func001Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "magicleash", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2, 0.30)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2, function Trig_Dragonhawk_Rider_Aerial_Shackles_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mortar Team Flare
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_MortarTeams) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'oeye' )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'otot' )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003Func003002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ushd' )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003Func003002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ucrm' )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ushd'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ucrm')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'otot'), (GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ushd'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ucrm')))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'oeye'), (GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'otot'), (GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ushd'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ucrm')))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'oeye'), (GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'otot'), (GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ushd'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ucrm')))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003Func004Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
        set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "flare", udg_Point2)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeFlare[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_MortarTeams)
    if ( Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1150.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003Func003002003))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_MortarTeams, function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Func003Func004A)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mortar_Team_Flare takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mortar_Team_Flare=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Mortar_Team_Flare, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mortar_Team_Flare, Condition(function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mortar_Team_Flare, function Trig_Mortar_Team_Flare_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wind Walk
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func005002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func005002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func005002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func005002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeWindWalk[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AOwk') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit, 'BOwk') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Blademasters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Wind_Walk_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Blademasters)
        if ( Trig_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func005002003))
            if ( Trig_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func006C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "windwalk")
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wind_Walk takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wind_Walk=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Wind_Walk, 1.76)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wind_Walk, function Trig_Wind_Walk_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wind Walk 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002Func002002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd' )
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002Func002002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd'), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd'), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd'), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd'), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WindWalkUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit, 'BOwk') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WindWalkUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] != null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Blademasters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Blademasters)
        if ( Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_WindWalkUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))]=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func003C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "attack", udg_WindWalkUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))])
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wind_Walk_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wind_Walk_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Wind_Walk_2, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wind_Walk_2, function Trig_Wind_Walk_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wind Walk Unit Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_WindWalkUnit[7] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_WindWalkUnit[8] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_WindWalkUnit[9] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_WindWalkUnit[10] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_WindWalkUnit[11] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_WindWalkUnit[12] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_WindWalkUnit[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=7
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_WindWalkUnit[GetForLoopIndexA()]=null
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies, function Trig_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blademaster Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blademaster_Dies_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Obla' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Nbbc' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Ogrh' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Opgh' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Blademaster_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Blademaster_Dies_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blademaster_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_WindWalkUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=null
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blademaster_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blademaster_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Blademaster_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Blademaster_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Blademaster_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Blademaster_Dies, function Trig_Blademaster_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mirror Image
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mirror_Image_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Obla' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Nbbc' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Ogrh' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Opgh' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Mirror_Image_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Mirror_Image_Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeMirrorImage[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOmi') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetTriggerUnit()) != String2OrderIdBJ("whirlwind") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'BOwk') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mirror_Image_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Mirror_Image_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mirror_Image_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "mirrorimage")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mirror_Image takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mirror_Image=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Mirror_Image, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mirror_Image, Condition(function Trig_Mirror_Image_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mirror_Image, function Trig_Mirror_Image_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Bladestorm
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Bladestorm_Func001Func003Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Bladestorm_Func001Func003Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Bladestorm_Func001Func003Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Bladestorm_Func001Func003Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Bladestorm_Func001Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Bladestorm_Func001Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bladestorm_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeBladestorm[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AOww') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AOww', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOww', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit, 'BOwk') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bladestorm_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Blademasters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bladestorm_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Bladestorm_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Blademasters)
        if ( Trig_Bladestorm_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Bladestorm_Func001Func003Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Bladestorm_Func001Func003Func004C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "whirlwind")
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bladestorm takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bladestorm=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Bladestorm, 1.90)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Bladestorm, function Trig_Bladestorm_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chain Lightning
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001Func003Func003Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001Func003Func003Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001Func003Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001Func003Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeChainLightning[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AOcl') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AOcl', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOcl', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("earthquake") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_FarSeers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chain_Lightning_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_FarSeers)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        if ( Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001Func003Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001Func003Func003Func003002003))
                if ( Trig_Chain_Lightning_Func001Func003Func003Func004C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "chainlightning", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Chain_Lightning takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Chain_Lightning=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Chain_Lightning, 1.10)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Chain_Lightning, function Trig_Chain_Lightning_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spirit Wolves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spirit_Wolves_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Ofar' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Odrt' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Othr' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Wolves_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Spirit_Wolves_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeSpiritWolves[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'AOsf') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOsf', GetAttacker()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Wolves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "spiritwolf")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spirit_Wolves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spirit_Wolves=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Spirit_Wolves, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spirit_Wolves, Condition(function Trig_Spirit_Wolves_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spirit_Wolves, function Trig_Spirit_Wolves_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Firebolt
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup4) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("earthquake") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeFirebolt[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANfb') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('ANfb', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANfb', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_FarSeers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Firebolt_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_FarSeers)
        if ( Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "firebolt", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup4=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003))
                if ( Trig_Firebolt_Func001Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "firebolt", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup4))
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup4)
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Firebolt takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Firebolt=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Firebolt, 0.90)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Firebolt, function Trig_Firebolt_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Earthquake
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Earthquake_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_FarSeers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeEarthquake[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AOeq') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AOeq', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOeq', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_FarSeers)
    if ( Trig_Earthquake_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Earthquake_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_Earthquake_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "earthquake", udg_Point2)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Earthquake takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Earthquake=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Earthquake, 1.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Earthquake, Condition(function Trig_Earthquake_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Earthquake, function Trig_Earthquake_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Earthquake Point Check
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanOr((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanOr((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_EarthquakeActive[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Func001Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_EarthquakePoint[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))], Condition(function Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func004C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "stop")
        else
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_FarSeers, function Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Earthquake_Point_Check takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Earthquake_Point_Check=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Earthquake_Point_Check, 2)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Earthquake_Point_Check, function Trig_Earthquake_Point_Check_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: Shockwave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003Func003Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003Func003Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003Func003Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003Func003Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeShockwave[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AOsh') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AOsh', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOsh', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shockwave_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_TaurenChieftains) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shockwave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Shockwave_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_TaurenChieftains)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        if ( Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003Func003Func003002003))
                if ( Trig_Shockwave_Func001Func003Func003Func004C() ) then
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "shockwave", udg_Point2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shockwave takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shockwave=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Shockwave, 1.70)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shockwave, function Trig_Shockwave_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: War Stomp
//===========================================================================
function Trig_War_Stomp_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Otch' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Ocbh' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_War_Stomp_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_War_Stomp_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeWarStomp[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'AOws') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_War_Stomp_Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_War_Stomp_Func004002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_War_Stomp_Func004002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_War_Stomp_Func004002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_War_Stomp_Func004002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_War_Stomp_Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_War_Stomp_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_War_Stomp_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_War_Stomp_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_War_Stomp_Func004002003))
    if ( Trig_War_Stomp_Func005C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "stomp")
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_War_Stomp takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_War_Stomp=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_War_Stomp, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_War_Stomp, Condition(function Trig_War_Stomp_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_War_Stomp, function Trig_War_Stomp_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Healing Wave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Healing_Wave_Func001Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Wave_Func001Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 60.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Wave_Func001Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 60.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Wave_Func001Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Wave_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeHealingWave[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AOhw') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("voodoo") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AOhw', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOhw', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Wave_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_ShadowHunters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Wave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Healing_Wave_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_ShadowHunters)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        if ( Trig_Healing_Wave_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Healing_Wave_Func001Func003Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Healing_Wave_Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "healingwave", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Healing_Wave takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Healing_Wave=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Healing_Wave, 1.90)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Healing_Wave, function Trig_Healing_Wave_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hex
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 4), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 4), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func003Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) < 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func003Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) < 4), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) < 4), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeHex[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AOhx') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("voodoo") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AOhx', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOhx', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hex_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_ShadowHunters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hex_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Hex_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_ShadowHunters)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        if ( Trig_Hex_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "hex", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func003Func002002003))
                if ( Trig_Hex_Func001Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "hex", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3))
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hex takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hex=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Hex, 1.85)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hex, function Trig_Hex_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Serpent_Ward_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Oshd' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Orkn' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Serpent_Ward_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeSerpentWard[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'AOsw') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetAttacker()) != String2OrderIdBJ("voodoo") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "ward", udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Big Bad Voodoo
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Func001Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Func001Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Func001Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Func001Func003Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Func001Func003Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Func001Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Func001Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeBigBadVoodoo[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AOvd') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AOvd', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOvd', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_ShadowHunters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_ShadowHunters)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        if ( Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Func001Func003Func002002003))
            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Func001Func003Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Func001Func003Func004C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "voodoo")
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Big_Bad_Voodoo takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Big_Bad_Voodoo=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Big_Bad_Voodoo, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Big_Bad_Voodoo, function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Big Bad Voodoo Check
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check_Func001Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check_Func001Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check_Func001Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) < 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit, 'BOvc') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_ShadowHunters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_ShadowHunters)
        if ( Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check_Func001Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "stop")
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check, function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_Check_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Big Bad Voodoo is attacked
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_is_attacked_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'BOvc') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 35.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_is_attacked_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "stop")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_is_attacked takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Big_Bad_Voodoo_is_attacked=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Big_Bad_Voodoo_is_attacked, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Big_Bad_Voodoo_is_attacked, Condition(function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_is_attacked_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Big_Bad_Voodoo_is_attacked, function Trig_Big_Bad_Voodoo_is_attacked_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: Berserker Berserk
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Berserker_Berserk_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'otbk' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'ndtb' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'nftb' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'nits' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_activeBerserk[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Berserker_Berserk_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Berserker_Berserk_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "berserk")
endfunction
