endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Batrider Unstable Concoction
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'otbr' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeUnstableConcoction[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 2) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "unstableconcoction", GetAttacker())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction, Condition(function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction, function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Batrider Unstable Concoction 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2_Func001Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'otbr' )
endfunction

function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2_Func001Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2_Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'otbr'), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2_Func001Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeUnstableConcoction[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Batriders) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2_Func001Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            if ( Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2_Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "unstableconcoction", GetAttacker())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2, Condition(function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2, function Trig_Batrider_Unstable_Concoction_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shaman Purge
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shaman_Purge_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'uske' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'uskm' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'oshm' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activePurge[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Shaman_Purge_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "purge", GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shaman_Purge takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shaman_Purge=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Shaman_Purge, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Shaman_Purge, Condition(function Trig_Shaman_Purge_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shaman_Purge, function Trig_Shaman_Purge_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shaman Purge 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Shamans) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bply') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func002002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func002002003002002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func002002003002002002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func002002003002002002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcyc') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func002002003002002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcyc') == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func002002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcyc') == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcyc') == true)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcyc') == true)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bply') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcyc') == true)))))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bply') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcyc') == true)))))))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) < UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) < UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func003Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) > UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) > UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func005002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func005002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func006Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_Unit2) != 'uplg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activePurge[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Shamans)
    if ( Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "purge", udg_Unit2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "purge", udg_Unit2)
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func003Func001002003))
                if ( Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func003Func002C() ) then
                    set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3)
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "purge", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(650.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func005002003))
            if ( Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func006C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                if ( Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Func004Func003Func006Func003C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "purge", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shaman_Purge_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shaman_Purge_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Shaman_Purge_2, 0.70)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Shaman_Purge_2, Condition(function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shaman_Purge_2, function Trig_Shaman_Purge_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shaman Lightning Shield
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shaman_Lightning_Shield_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'oshm' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeLightningShield[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'Blsh') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Lightning_Shield_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Lightning_Shield_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shaman_Lightning_Shield_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(175.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Shaman_Lightning_Shield_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_Shaman_Lightning_Shield_Func003C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "lightningshield", GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shaman_Lightning_Shield takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shaman_Lightning_Shield=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Shaman_Lightning_Shield, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Shaman_Lightning_Shield, Condition(function Trig_Shaman_Lightning_Shield_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shaman_Lightning_Shield, function Trig_Shaman_Lightning_Shield_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spirit Walker Spirit Link
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'ospw' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'Bspl') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetTriggerUnit()) != String2OrderIdBJ("dispel") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeSpiritLink[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "spiritlink", GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link, Condition(function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link, function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spirit Walker Spirit Link 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2_Func001Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2_Func001Func004002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2_Func001Func004002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) < 100.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2_Func001Func004002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bspl') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2_Func001Func004002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) < 100.00), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bspl') == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2_Func001Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) < 100.00), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bspl') == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2_Func001Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) < 100.00), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bspl') == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2_Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeSpiritLink[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_SpiritWalkers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_SpiritWalkers)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2_Func001Func004002003))
        if ( Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2_Func001Func005C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "spiritlink", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2, function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Spirit_Link_2_Actions)
endfunction

    endif
    return true

endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) < UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) < UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func003Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) > UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) > UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func005002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func005002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func006Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_Unit2) != 'uplg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeDisenchant[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_SpiritWalkers)
    if ( Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "dispel", udg_Unit2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "dispel", udg_Unit2)
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func003Func001002003))
                if ( Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func003Func002C() ) then
                    set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3)
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "dispel", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(650.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func005002003))
            if ( Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func006C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                if ( Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Func003Func003Func006Func003C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "dispel", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant, Condition(function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant, function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Disenchant_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spirit Walker Ancestral Spirit
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'otau' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'ospw' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ospw' )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ospw')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit_Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeAncestralSpirit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit_Func003002003))
    if ( Trig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
        if ( Trig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit_Func004Func002C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "ancestralspirit")
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit, Condition(function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit, function Trig_Spirit_Walker_Ancestral_Spirit_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Witch Doctor Stasis Trap Healing Ward
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'odoc' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'ndth' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'nfsh' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'nith' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Func006C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Func004Func001Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ohwd' )
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Func004Func001Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Func004Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ohwd'), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Func004Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeHealingWard[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeStasisTrap[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GetAttacker()
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
    set udg_Integer=GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Func004C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "stasistrap", udg_Point)
    else
        if ( Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Func004Func001C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "healingward", udg_Point)
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Func004Func001Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Func004Func001Func003C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "healingward", udg_Point)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward, Condition(function Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward, function Trig_Witch_Doctor_Stasis_Trap_Healing_Ward_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kodo_Beast_Devour_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'okod' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nckb' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Kodo_Beast_Devour_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Kodo_Beast_Devour_Func006C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeDevour[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kodo_Beast_Devour_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_Point, udg_Point2) <= 300.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kodo_Beast_Devour_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    if ( Trig_Kodo_Beast_Devour_Func003C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "devour", GetAttacker())
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kodo_Beast_Devour takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kodo_Beast_Devour=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Kodo_Beast_Devour, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Kodo_Beast_Devour, Condition(function Trig_Kodo_Beast_Devour_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Kodo_Beast_Devour, function Trig_Kodo_Beast_Devour_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Death Coil
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 3), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 3), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 3), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004Func002Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004Func002Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004Func002Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup4) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeDeathCoil[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AUdc') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DeathKnights) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Death_Coil_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_DeathKnights)
        if ( Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "deathcoil", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003))
                if ( Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "deathcoil", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3))
                else
                    set udg_UnitGroup4=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004Func002Func001002003))
                    if ( Trig_Death_Coil_Func001Func002Func004Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "deathcoil", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup4))
                    else
                    endif
                    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup4)
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Death_Coil takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Death_Coil=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Death_Coil, 1.20)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Death_Coil, function Trig_Death_Coil_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Death Pact
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Death_Pact_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Udea' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Harf' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Death_Pact_Func007Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeDeathPact[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 60.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetTriggerUnit(), 'AUdp') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetTriggerUnit()) != String2OrderIdBJ("deathpact") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Death_Pact_Func007C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Real >= GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetFilterUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 4), (udg_Real >= GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetFilterUnit()))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 4), (udg_Real >= GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetFilterUnit()))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 4), (udg_Real >= GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetFilterUnit()))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 4), (udg_Real >= GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetFilterUnit()))))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func004Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func004Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func004Func001002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func004Func001002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) < 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func004Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) < 4)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) < 4)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) < 4)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Real=( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) )
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003))
    if ( Trig_Death_Pact_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "deathpact", udg_Unit)
    else
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Death_Pact_Func004Func001002003))
        if ( Trig_Death_Pact_Func004Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "deathpact", udg_Unit)
        else
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Death_Pact takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Death_Pact=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Death_Pact, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Death_Pact, Condition(function Trig_Death_Pact_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Death_Pact, function Trig_Death_Pact_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Animate Dead
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Animate_Dead_Func001Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Animate_Dead_Func001Func002Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AUan') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Animate_Dead_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Animate_Dead_Func001Func002Func003Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Animate_Dead_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeAnimateDead[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Animate_Dead_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DeathKnights) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Animate_Dead_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Animate_Dead_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_DeathKnights)
        if ( Trig_Animate_Dead_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(900.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Animate_Dead_Func001Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Animate_Dead_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "animatedead")
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Animate_Dead takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Animate_Dead=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Animate_Dead, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Animate_Dead, function Trig_Animate_Dead_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Frost Nova
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001Func003Func003Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001Func003Func003Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001Func003Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001Func003Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeFrostNova[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AUfn') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AUfn', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AUfn', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("deathanddecay") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Liches) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Nova_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Liches)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        if ( Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001Func003Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001Func003Func003Func003002003))
                if ( Trig_Frost_Nova_Func001Func003Func003Func004C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "frostnova", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Frost_Nova takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Frost_Nova=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Frost_Nova, 1.20)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Frost_Nova, function Trig_Frost_Nova_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Autocast Frost Armor ON
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Autocast_Frost_Armor_ON_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetIssuedOrderIdBJ() == String2OrderIdBJ("frostarmoron") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Autocast_Frost_Armor_ON_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=LoadUnitHandleBJ(GetHandleIdBJ(GetTriggerUnit()), 0, udg_HeroTable)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "frostarmoron")
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Autocast_Frost_Armor_ON=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Autocast_Frost_Armor_ON, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ISSUED_ORDER)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Autocast_Frost_Armor_ON, Condition(function Trig_Autocast_Frost_Armor_ON_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Autocast_Frost_Armor_ON, function Trig_Autocast_Frost_Armor_ON_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

    endif

endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("deathanddecay") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Ritual_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeDarkRitual[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitManaPercent(udg_Unit) <= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Ritual_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Liches) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Ritual_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dark_Ritual_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Liches)
        if ( Trig_Dark_Ritual_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            if ( Trig_Dark_Ritual_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Dark_Ritual_Func001Func002Func003Func001002003))
                if ( Trig_Dark_Ritual_Func001Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                    set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "darkritual", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Death and Decay
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001Func003Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001Func003Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001Func003Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001Func003Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeDeathAndDecay[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AUdd') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AUdd', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AUdd', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Liches) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Liches)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        if ( Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001Func003Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001Func003Func003Func002002003))
                if ( Trig_Death_and_Decay_Func001Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "deathanddecay", udg_Point2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Death_and_Decay takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Death_and_Decay=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Death_and_Decay, 1.60)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Death_and_Decay, function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Death and Decay Point Check
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DeathAndDecayActive[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check_Func001Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_DeathAndDecayPoint[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))], Condition(function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func004C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "stop")
        else
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Liches, function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check, function Trig_Death_and_Decay_Point_Check_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func001Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BUsl') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func001Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BUsl') == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func001Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit2, 'B007') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func001Func003Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit2, 'B007') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSleep[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction
