    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeInferno[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AUin') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AUin', udg_Unit) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AUin', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AUin', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func004Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func004Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func004Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeCarrionSwarm[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AUcs') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AUcs', udg_Unit) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AUcs', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AUcs', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Dreadlords) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Dreadlords)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        if ( Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func004C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func004Func003002003))
                if ( Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func004Func004C() ) then
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "carrionswarm", udg_Point2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
            if ( Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002C() ) then
                set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func003002003))
                if ( Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func004C() ) then
                    set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                    set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                    set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func004Func003002003))
                    if ( Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func004Func004C() ) then
                        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "dreadlordinferno", udg_Point2)
                    else
                    endif
                    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            else
                if ( Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
                    set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func001Func002002003))
                    if ( Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func001Func003C() ) then
                        set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                        if ( Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func001Func003Func006C() ) then
                            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "thunderbolt", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                        else
                        endif
                    else
                        set udg_UnitGroup4=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func001Func003Func001002003))
                        set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup4)
                        if ( Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
                            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "thunderbolt", udg_Unit2)
                        else
                        endif
                        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup4)
                    endif
                    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dreadlord_Abilities takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dreadlord_Abilities=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Dreadlord_Abilities, 0.80)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dreadlord_Abilities, function Trig_Dreadlord_Abilities_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_activeLocustSwarm[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AUls') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AUls', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AUls', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeImpale[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AUim') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AUim', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AUim', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_CryptLords) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_CryptLords)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        if ( Trig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func004C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func004Func003002003))
                if ( Trig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func004Func004C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "impale", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
            if ( Trig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002C() ) then
                set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func002002003))
                if ( Trig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities_Func001Func003Func002Func003C() ) then
                    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "locustswarm")
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            else
            endif
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Crypt_Lord_Abilities=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Crypt_Lord_Abilities, 1.10)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Crypt_Lord_Abilities, function Trig_Crypt_Lord_Abilities_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Autocast Carrion Beetles ON
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_ON_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetIssuedOrderIdBJ() == String2OrderIdBJ("carrionscarabson") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_ON_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=LoadUnitHandleBJ(GetHandleIdBJ(GetTriggerUnit()), 0, udg_HeroTable)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "carrionscarabson")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_ON takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_ON=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_ON, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ISSUED_ORDER)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_ON, Condition(function Trig_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_ON_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_ON, function Trig_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_ON_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Autocast Carrion Beetles OFF
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_OFF_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetIssuedOrderIdBJ() == String2OrderIdBJ("carrionscarabsoff") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_OFF_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=LoadUnitHandleBJ(GetHandleIdBJ(GetTriggerUnit()), 0, udg_HeroTable)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "carrionscarabsoff")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_OFF takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_OFF=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_OFF, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ISSUED_ORDER)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_OFF, Condition(function Trig_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_OFF_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_OFF, function Trig_Autocast_Carrion_Beetles_OFF_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Crypt Fiend Burrow
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Burrow_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'ucry' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nnwa' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nnwq' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Burrow_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Burrow_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeBurrow[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_CryptFiendBurrow) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Burrow_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "burrow")
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_CryptFiendBurrow)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Crypt_Fiend_Burrow takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Crypt_Fiend_Burrow=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Crypt_Fiend_Burrow, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Crypt_Fiend_Burrow, Condition(function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Burrow_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Crypt_Fiend_Burrow, function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Burrow_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Crypt Fiend Unburrow
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow_Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ucrm' )
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "unburrow")
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow_Func001002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow, 3.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow, function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Crypt Fiend Unburrow 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupClear(udg_CryptFiendBurrow)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow_2, 15.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow_2, function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Unburrow_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Crypt Fiend Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Dies_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'ucry' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'ucrm' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Dies_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_CryptFiendBurrow)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Crypt_Fiend_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Crypt_Fiend_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Crypt_Fiend_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Crypt_Fiend_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Crypt_Fiend_Dies, function Trig_Crypt_Fiend_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gargoyle Stone Form
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gargoyle_Stone_Form_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'ugar' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeStoneForm[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rusf', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_GargoyleStoneForm) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Stone_Form_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "stoneform")
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_GargoyleStoneForm)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gargoyle_Stone_Form takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gargoyle_Stone_Form=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Gargoyle_Stone_Form, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Gargoyle_Stone_Form, Condition(function Trig_Gargoyle_Stone_Form_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Gargoyle_Stone_Form, function Trig_Gargoyle_Stone_Form_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gargoyle Unstone Form
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gargoyle_Unstone_Form_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'ugrm' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Unstone_Form_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Gargoyle_Unstone_Form_Func001Func001C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "unstoneform")
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Unstone_Form_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GargoyleStoneForm, function Trig_Gargoyle_Unstone_Form_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gargoyle_Unstone_Form takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gargoyle_Unstone_Form=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Gargoyle_Unstone_Form, 3.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Gargoyle_Unstone_Form, function Trig_Gargoyle_Unstone_Form_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gargoyle Uses Unstone Form
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gargoyle_Uses_Unstone_Form_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'Astn' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'ugrm' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Uses_Unstone_Form_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_GargoyleStoneForm)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gargoyle_Uses_Unstone_Form takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gargoyle_Uses_Unstone_Form=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Gargoyle_Uses_Unstone_Form, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Gargoyle_Uses_Unstone_Form, Condition(function Trig_Gargoyle_Uses_Unstone_Form_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Gargoyle_Uses_Unstone_Form, function Trig_Gargoyle_Uses_Unstone_Form_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Necromancer Raise Dead
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'oeye' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'ohwd' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'otot' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'nowl' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'edry' )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSummonedUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'edry'), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSummonedUnit())) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func006002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'hmpr' )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func006002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSummonedUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func006002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'hmpr'), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSummonedUnit())) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func009002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ospw' )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func009002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSummonedUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func009002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ospw'), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSummonedUnit())) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func012002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func012002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSummonedUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func012002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSummonedUnit())) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func014002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ubsp' )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func014002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSummonedUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func014002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'ubsp'), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSummonedUnit())) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // DETECT DISPELLING UNITS
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetSummonedUnit())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(512, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func003002003))
    if ( Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "autodispel", GetSummonedUnit())
    else
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(512, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func006002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_UnitGroup, udg_UnitGroup2)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(512, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func009002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_UnitGroup, udg_UnitGroup2)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func012002003))
    if ( Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func013C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "dispel", GetSummonedUnit())
    else
    endif
    set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(512, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func014002003))
    if ( Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Func015C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "devourmagic", udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Necromancer_Raise_Dead=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Necromancer_Raise_Dead, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SUMMON)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Necromancer_Raise_Dead, Condition(function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Necromancer_Raise_Dead, function Trig_Necromancer_Raise_Dead_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Necromancer Unholy Frenzy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Necromancers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Buhf') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Buhf') == false), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Buhf') == false), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func003Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Buhf') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Buhf') == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func003Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_Unit2) != 'ushd' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("cripple") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeUnholyFrenzy[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Necromancers)
    if ( Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "unholyfrenzy", udg_Unit2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func003Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func003Func002C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                if ( Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Func003Func003Func002Func002C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "unholyfrenzy", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy, 0.55)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy, Condition(function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy, function Trig_Necromancer_Unholy_Frenzy_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_Unit2) != 'ushd' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Cripple_Func002Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Cripple_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("unholyfrenzy") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Cripple_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeCripple[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_Cripple_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Necromancers)
    if ( Trig_Necromancer_Cripple_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Necromancer_Cripple_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_Necromancer_Cripple_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "cripple", udg_Unit2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Necromancer_Cripple_Func002Func003Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_Necromancer_Cripple_Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                if ( Trig_Necromancer_Cripple_Func002Func003Func002Func002C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "cripple", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Necromancer_Cripple takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Necromancer_Cripple=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Necromancer_Cripple, 0.70)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Necromancer_Cripple, Condition(function Trig_Necromancer_Cripple_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Necromancer_Cripple, function Trig_Necromancer_Cripple_Actions)
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Anti_Magic_Shell_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bams') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Anti_Magic_Shell_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bams') == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Anti_Magic_Shell_Func001Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_Unit2) != 'ushd' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("possession") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Anti_Magic_Shell_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Banshees) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Anti_Magic_Shell_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Banshee_Anti_Magic_Shell_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Banshees)
        if ( Trig_Banshee_Anti_Magic_Shell_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Banshee_Anti_Magic_Shell_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Banshee_Anti_Magic_Shell_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                if ( Trig_Banshee_Anti_Magic_Shell_Func001Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "antimagicshell", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Banshee_Anti_Magic_Shell=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Banshee_Anti_Magic_Shell, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Banshee_Anti_Magic_Shell, function Trig_Banshee_Anti_Magic_Shell_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Banshee Possession
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'uban' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'ngh2' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Banshee_Possession_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activePossession[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetTriggerUnit()) != String2OrderIdBJ("possession") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "acidbomb", GetAttacker())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Banshee_Possession takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Banshee_Possession=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Banshee_Possession, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Banshee_Possession, Condition(function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Banshee_Possession, function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Banshee Possession Random
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Random_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Banshees) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Random_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Random_Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Random_Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), udg_PossessionGroup) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Random_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00), (IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), udg_PossessionGroup) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Random_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00), (IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), udg_PossessionGroup) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Random_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Random_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activePossession[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("possession") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Random_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Banshees)
    if ( Trig_Banshee_Possession_Random_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Random_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_Banshee_Possession_Random_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "acidbomb", udg_Unit2)
        else
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Banshee_Possession_Random takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Banshee_Possession_Random=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Banshee_Possession_Random, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Banshee_Possession_Random, Condition(function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Random_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Banshee_Possession_Random, function Trig_Banshee_Possession_Random_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Obsidian Staue Spirit Touch
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch_Func001Func001Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch_Func001Func001Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'uobs' )
endfunction

function Trig_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch_Func001Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == false), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'uobs')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch_Func001Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSpiritTouch[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch_Func001Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch_Func001Func001Func002002003))
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
        if ( Trig_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch_Func001Func001Func004C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "replenishmana")
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ObsidianStatues, function Trig_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch, function Trig_Obsidian_Staue_Spirit_Touch_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Destroyer Absorb Mana 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Destroyers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func004Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func004Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func004Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func004Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func004Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func004Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_Point, udg_Point2) < udg_Real ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func004Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    if ( Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func004Func003Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Unit2=GetEnumUnit()
        set udg_Real=DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_Point, udg_Point2)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) <= 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("absorb") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeAbsorbMana[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Destroyers)
    if ( Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_Real=400.00
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(udg_Real, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func004Func002002003))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Func002Func004Func003A)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "absorb", udg_Unit2)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        else
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2, 0.30)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2, Condition(function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2, function Trig_Destroyer_Absorb_Mana_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Destroyer Devour Magic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Destroyers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bply') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func002002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func002002003002002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func002002003002002002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func002002003002002002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func002002003002002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func002002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bply') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bply') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))))))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) < UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) < UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func003Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) > UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false) > UnitCountBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_POSITIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_MAGIC, GetFilterUnit(), false, false))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func005002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func005002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func006Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_Unit2) != 'uplg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeDevourMagic[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Destroyers)
    if ( Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "devourmagic", udg_Point2)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "devourmagic", udg_Point2)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func003Func001002003))
                if ( Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func003Func002C() ) then
                    set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3)
                    set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "devourmagic", udg_Point2)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(650.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func005002003))
            if ( Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func006C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                if ( Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Func003Func003Func006Func003C() ) then
                    set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "devourmagic", udg_Point2)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Destroyer_Devour_Magic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Destroyer_Devour_Magic, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Destroyer_Devour_Magic, Condition(function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Destroyer_Devour_Magic, function Trig_Destroyer_Devour_Magic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Entangling Roots
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Entangling_Roots_Func001Func003Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Entangling_Roots_Func001Func003Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Entangling_Roots_Func001Func003Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Entangling_Roots_Func001Func003Func006Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Entangling_Roots_Func001Func003Func006Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup4) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Entangling_Roots_Func001Func003Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Entangling_Roots_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeEntanglingRoots[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AEer') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("tranquility") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Entangling_Roots_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_KeeperOfTheGroves) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Entangling_Roots_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Entangling_Roots_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_KeeperOfTheGroves)
        if ( Trig_Entangling_Roots_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Entangling_Roots_Func001Func003Func005002003))
            if ( Trig_Entangling_Roots_Func001Func003Func006C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "entanglingroots", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3))
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup4=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Entangling_Roots_Func001Func003Func006Func001002003))
                if ( Trig_Entangling_Roots_Func001Func003Func006Func002C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "entanglingroots", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup4))
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup4)
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Entangling_Roots takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Entangling_Roots=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Entangling_Roots, 1.13)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Entangling_Roots, function Trig_Entangling_Roots_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Force of Nature
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Force_of_Nature_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Ekee' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Ecen' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Ekgg' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Emns' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Force_of_Nature_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Force_of_Nature_Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeForceOfNature[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A012') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetTriggerUnit()) != String2OrderIdBJ("tranquility") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Force_of_Nature_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Force_of_Nature_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Force_of_Nature_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "spiritwolf")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Force_of_Nature takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Force_of_Nature=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Force_of_Nature, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Force_of_Nature, Condition(function Trig_Force_of_Nature_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Force_of_Nature, function Trig_Force_of_Nature_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tranquility
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tranquility_Func001Func003Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Tranquility_Func001Func003Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Tranquility_Func001Func003Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Tranquility_Func001Func003Func006002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Tranquility_Func001Func003Func006002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Tranquility_Func001Func003Func006002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Tranquility_Func001Func003Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tranquility_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeTranquility[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AEtq') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("tranquility") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tranquility_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_KeeperOfTheGroves) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tranquility_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Tranquility_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_KeeperOfTheGroves)
        if ( Trig_Tranquility_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Tranquility_Func001Func003Func005002003))
            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(900.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Tranquility_Func001Func003Func006002003))
            if ( Trig_Tranquility_Func001Func003Func007C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "tranquility")
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Tranquility=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Tranquility, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Tranquility, function Trig_Tranquility_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Autocast Searing Arrows ON
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Autocast_Searing_Arrows_ON_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetIssuedOrderIdBJ() == String2OrderIdBJ("flamingarrows") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetTriggerUnit()) != String2OrderIdBJ("starfall") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Autocast_Searing_Arrows_ON_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=LoadUnitHandleBJ(GetHandleIdBJ(GetTriggerUnit()), 0, udg_HeroTable)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "flamingarrows")
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Autocast_Searing_Arrows_ON=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Autocast_Searing_Arrows_ON, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ISSUED_ORDER)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Autocast_Searing_Arrows_ON, Condition(function Trig_Autocast_Searing_Arrows_ON_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Autocast_Searing_Arrows_ON, function Trig_Autocast_Searing_Arrows_ON_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetTriggerUnit()) != String2OrderIdBJ("starfall") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

endfunction
