//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Silence
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Silence_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Func001Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Func001Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSilence[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANsi') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('ANsi', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANsi', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("starfall") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_PriestessOfTheMoons) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Silence_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_PriestessOfTheMoons)
        if ( Trig_Silence_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Silence_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Silence_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "silence", udg_Point2)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Silence takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Silence=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Silence, 2.10)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Silence, function Trig_Silence_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AEsf') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif
    return true

        if ( Trig_Starfall_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(850.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Starfall_Func001Func003Func005002003))
            if ( Trig_Starfall_Func001Func003Func006C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "starfall")
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Starfall Check
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Starfall_Check_Func001Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Starfall_Check_Func001Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Starfall_Check_Func001Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Starfall_Check_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starfall_Check_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit, 'XEsf') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starfall_Check_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_PriestessOfTheMoons) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starfall_Check_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Starfall_Check_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_PriestessOfTheMoons)
        if ( Trig_Starfall_Check_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Starfall_Check_Func001Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Starfall_Check_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "stop")
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Starfall_Check, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Starfall_Check, function Trig_Starfall_Check_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: Mana Burn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mana_Burn_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Burn_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Burn_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Burn_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Burn_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeManaBurn[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AEmb') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AEmb', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AEmb', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Burn_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DemonHunters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Burn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Mana_Burn_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_DemonHunters)
        if ( Trig_Mana_Burn_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Mana_Burn_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Mana_Burn_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "manaburn", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Mana_Burn, 2.05)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mana_Burn, function Trig_Mana_Burn_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Immolation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Immolation_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Immolation_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Immolation_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Immolation_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Immolation_Func001Func002Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ImmolationCounter[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] > 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Immolation_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeImmolation[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Immolation_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DemonHunters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Immolation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Immolation_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_DemonHunters)
        if ( Trig_Immolation_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Immolation_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Immolation_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "immolation")
                set udg_ImmolationCounter[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))]=0
            else
                set udg_ImmolationCounter[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))]=( udg_ImmolationCounter[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] + 1 )
            endif
            if ( Trig_Immolation_Func001Func002Func005C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "unimmolation")
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Immolation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Immolation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Immolation, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Immolation, function Trig_Immolation_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Metamorphosis
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Metamorphosis_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Metamorphosis_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Metamorphosis_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Metamorphosis_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Metamorphosis_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeMetamorphosis[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AEme', udg_Unit) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AEme') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Metamorphosis_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DemonHunters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Metamorphosis_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Metamorphosis_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_DemonHunters)
        if ( Trig_Metamorphosis_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Metamorphosis_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Metamorphosis_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "metamorphosis")
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Metamorphosis takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Metamorphosis=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Metamorphosis, 1.60)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Metamorphosis, function Trig_Metamorphosis_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fan of Knives
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Ewar' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'E00R' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Ewrd' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeFanOfKnives[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'AEfk') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Func004002003))
    if ( Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Func005C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "fanofknives")
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fan_of_Knives takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fan_of_Knives=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Fan_of_Knives, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Fan_of_Knives, Condition(function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fan_of_Knives, function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blink
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blink_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Ewar' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E00R' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Ewrd' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Blink_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Blink_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeBlink[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetTriggerUnit(), 'AEbl') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blink_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Teams[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blink_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_Blink_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=Location(( GetLocationX(udg_Point) + 1000.00 ), GetLocationY(udg_Point))
    else
        set udg_Point2=Location(( GetLocationX(udg_Point) - 1000.00 ), GetLocationY(udg_Point))
    endif
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "blink", udg_Point2)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blink takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blink=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Blink, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Blink, Condition(function Trig_Blink_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Blink, function Trig_Blink_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shadow Strike
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shadow_Strike_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Strike_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 5 )
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Strike_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 5)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Strike_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Strike_Func001Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup4) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Strike_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Strike_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeShadowStrike[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'AEsh') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('AEsh', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AEsh', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Strike_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Wardens) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Strike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Shadow_Strike_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Wardens)
        if ( Trig_Shadow_Strike_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Shadow_Strike_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Shadow_Strike_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "shadowstrike", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup4=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Shadow_Strike_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003))
                if ( Trig_Shadow_Strike_Func001Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "shadowstrike", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup4))
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup4)
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shadow_Strike takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shadow_Strike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Shadow_Strike, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shadow_Strike, function Trig_Shadow_Strike_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Vengeance
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Vengeance_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Ewar' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'E00R' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Ewrd' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Vengeance_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Vengeance_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeVengeance[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AEsv', GetAttacker()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'AEsv') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Vengeance_Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Vengeance_Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Vengeance_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Vengeance_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Vengeance_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Vengeance_Func004002003))
    if ( Trig_Vengeance_Func005C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "spiritofvengeance")
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Vengeance=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Vengeance, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Vengeance, Condition(function Trig_Vengeance_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Vengeance, function Trig_Vengeance_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dryad Abolish Magic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bply') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func003002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func003002003002002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func003002003002002002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func003002003002002002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func003002003002002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func003002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bply') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bply') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BEer') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BHbn') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BOhx') == true), (GetBooleanOr((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'BNso') == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'Bcy2') == true)))))))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func004Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func004Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func004Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Integer == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeAbolishMagic[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(650.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "autodispel", udg_Unit)
            set udg_Integer=( udg_Integer + 1 )
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(650.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func004Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002Func001Func004Func002C() ) then
                set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "autodispel", udg_Unit)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Integer=0
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Dryads, function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Func002A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dryad_Abolish_Magic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Dryad_Abolish_Magic, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dryad_Abolish_Magic, function Trig_Dryad_Abolish_Magic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Huntress Sentinel
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Huntress_Sentinel_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'esen' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'ensh' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Huntress_Sentinel_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Huntress_Sentinel_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 100) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeSentinel[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Huntress_Sentinel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "scout")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Huntress_Sentinel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Huntress_Sentinel=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Huntress_Sentinel, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Huntress_Sentinel, Condition(function Trig_Huntress_Sentinel_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Huntress_Sentinel, function Trig_Huntress_Sentinel_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Druid of the Talon Crow Form
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DruidOfTheTalons) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'nowl' )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func003002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ubsp' )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func003002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ubsp'), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'nowl'), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ubsp'), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'nowl'), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ubsp'), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'nowl'), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ubsp'), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'otbr' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func005Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=( udg_Integer + 1 )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'edtm' )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'edtm'), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "unravenform")
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'edot' )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'edot'), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeCrowForm[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006Func005Func001C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "ravenform")
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Integer == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_DruidOfTheTalons)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func003002003))
    set udg_Integer=0
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func005A)
    if ( Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006Func004002003))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup2, function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006Func005A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006Func001002003))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup2, function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Func006Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form, 0.60)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form, Condition(function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form, function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Crow_Form_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Druid of the Talon Cyclone
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Cyclone_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'edot' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeCyclone[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Cyclone_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'edot' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeCyclone[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Cyclone_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Cyclone_Func001C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "cyclone", GetTriggerUnit())
    else
        if ( Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Cyclone_Func001Func003C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "cyclone", GetAttacker())
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Cyclone takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Druid_of_the_Talon_Cyclone=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Druid_of_the_Talon_Cyclone, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Druid_of_the_Talon_Cyclone, function Trig_Druid_of_the_Talon_Cyclone_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Druid of the Claw Roar
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'edoc' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'edcm' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar_Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetAttacker(), 'Broa') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetAttacker()) != String2OrderIdBJ("rejuvination") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeRoar[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "roar")
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar, Condition(function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar, function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'edoc'), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_activeRoar[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("rejuvination") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar_2_Func003002003))
    if ( Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar_2_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
        if ( Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Roar_2_Func004Func002C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "roar")
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Druid of the Claw Rejuvenation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'Brej') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'hgyr' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'hmtt' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'ocat' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'umtw' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'uobs' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'ebal' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation_Func008Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'edoc' )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation_Func008Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation_Func008Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'edoc'), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation_Func008Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_Unit ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeRejuvenation[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation_Func008Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DruidOfTheClaws) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation_Func008Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation_Func008Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            if ( Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation_Func008Func003Func002C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "rejuvination", GetTriggerUnit())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation, Condition(function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation, function Trig_Druid_of_the_Claw_Rejuvenation_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mountain Giant Taunt
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mountain_Giant_Taunt_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'emtg' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nggr' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nggg' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nsgg' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Mountain_Giant_Taunt_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Mountain_Giant_Taunt_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetTriggerUnit(), 'Atau') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeTaunt[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mountain_Giant_Taunt_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "taunt")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mountain_Giant_Taunt takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mountain_Giant_Taunt=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Mountain_Giant_Taunt, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mountain_Giant_Taunt, Condition(function Trig_Mountain_Giant_Taunt_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mountain_Giant_Taunt, function Trig_Mountain_Giant_Taunt_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Healing Spray
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Healing_Spray_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Alchemists) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func003Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func003Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func003Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func003Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANhs') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("healingspray") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeHealingSpray[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Spray_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Alchemists)
    if ( Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func003Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Healing_Spray_Func003Func003Func004C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "healingspray", udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Healing_Spray takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Healing_Spray=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Healing_Spray, 1.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Healing_Spray, Condition(function Trig_Healing_Spray_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Healing_Spray, function Trig_Healing_Spray_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chemical Rage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chemical_Rage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Nalc' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeChemicalRage[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chemical_Rage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "chemicalrage")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Chemical_Rage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Chemical_Rage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Chemical_Rage, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Chemical_Rage, Condition(function Trig_Chemical_Rage_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Chemical_Rage, function Trig_Chemical_Rage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Acid Bomb
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001Func002Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANab') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("healingspray") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeAcidBomb[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Alchemists) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Acid_Bomb_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Alchemists)
        if ( Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003))
                if ( Trig_Acid_Bomb_Func001Func002Func003Func004C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "acidbomb", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Acid_Bomb takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Acid_Bomb=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Acid_Bomb, 1.75)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Acid_Bomb, function Trig_Acid_Bomb_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Transmute
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Transmute_Func001Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Transmute_Func001Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Transmute_Func001Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Transmute_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Transmute_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANtm') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("healingspray") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeTransmute[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Transmute_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Alchemists) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Transmute_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Transmute_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Alchemists)
        if ( Trig_Transmute_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Transmute_Func001Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Transmute_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "transmute", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Transmute takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Transmute=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Transmute, 2.20)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Transmute, function Trig_Transmute_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Transmute FIX
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Transmute_FIX_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'ANtm' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Transmute_FIX_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(R2I(GetUnitGoldCost(GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit())) * 0.5), Player(GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) - 7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    set udg_Integer=R2I(GetUnitGoldCost(GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit())) * 0.5)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    if ( GetLocalPlayer() == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) ) then
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( "+" + I2S(udg_Integer) ), udg_Point, 0, 14.00, 100, 100, 0.00, 0)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 16.00, 90)
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) - 6]=udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) - 6] + R2I(GetUnitGoldCost(GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit())) * 0.5)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Transmute_FIX takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Transmute_FIX=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Transmute_FIX, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Transmute_FIX, Condition(function Trig_Transmute_FIX_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Transmute_FIX, function Trig_Transmute_FIX_Actions)
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Forked_Lightning_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Forked_Lightning_Func001Func002Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forked_Lightning_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forked_Lightning_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANfl') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("tornado") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeForkedLightning[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forked_Lightning_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_SeaWitches) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forked_Lightning_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Forked_Lightning_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_SeaWitches)
        if ( Trig_Forked_Lightning_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Forked_Lightning_Func001Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Forked_Lightning_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Forked_Lightning_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003))
                if ( Trig_Forked_Lightning_Func001Func002Func003Func004C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "forkedlightning", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Forked_Lightning=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Forked_Lightning, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Forked_Lightning, function Trig_Forked_Lightning_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Autocast Frost Arrows ON
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Autocast_Frost_Arrows_ON_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetIssuedOrderIdBJ() == String2OrderIdBJ("coldarrows") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Autocast_Frost_Arrows_ON_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=LoadUnitHandleBJ(GetHandleIdBJ(GetTriggerUnit()), 0, udg_HeroTable)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "coldarrows")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Autocast_Frost_Arrows_ON takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Autocast_Frost_Arrows_ON=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Autocast_Frost_Arrows_ON, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ISSUED_ORDER)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Autocast_Frost_Arrows_ON, Condition(function Trig_Autocast_Frost_Arrows_ON_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Autocast_Frost_Arrows_ON, function Trig_Autocast_Frost_Arrows_ON_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mana Shield
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mana_Shield_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Nngs' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'BNms') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 20.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeManaShield[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Shield_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "manashieldon")
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Mana_Shield=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Mana_Shield, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mana_Shield, Condition(function Trig_Mana_Shield_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mana_Shield, function Trig_Mana_Shield_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Nngs' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'ANto') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeTornadoNeutral[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tornado_Neutral_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Tornado_Neutral_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "tornado", udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pocket Factory
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pocket_Factory_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Ntin' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Nrob' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Pocket_Factory_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Pocket_Factory_Func003Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'ANsy') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activePocketFactory[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pocket_Factory_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Pocket_Factory_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pocket_Factory_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_Point2=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point, 300.00, ( GetUnitFacing(GetAttacker()) + 180.00 ))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetAttacker(), "summonfactory", udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pocket_Factory takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pocket_Factory=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Pocket_Factory, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Pocket_Factory, Condition(function Trig_Pocket_Factory_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Pocket_Factory, function Trig_Pocket_Factory_Actions)
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction
