        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeClusterRockets[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Tinkers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Tinkers)
        if ( Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003))
                if ( Trig_Cluster_Rockets_Func001Func002Func003Func004C() ) then
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "clusterrockets", udg_Point2)
                else
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Robo_Goblin_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Robo_Goblin_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeRoboGoblin[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Robo_Goblin_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Tinkers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Robo_Goblin_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Robo_Goblin_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Tinkers)
        if ( Trig_Robo_Goblin_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Robo_Goblin_Func001Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Robo_Goblin_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "robogoblin")
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Robo_Goblin takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Robo_Goblin=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Robo_Goblin, 1.25)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Robo_Goblin, function Trig_Robo_Goblin_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon Bear
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon_Bear_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Nbst' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'ANsg') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeSummonBear[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Bear_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Summon_Bear_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Bear_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "summongrizzly")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summon_Bear takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summon_Bear=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Summon_Bear, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Summon_Bear, Condition(function Trig_Summon_Bear_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_Bear, function Trig_Summon_Bear_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon Hawk and Quilbeast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001Func001Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001Func001Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001Func001Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANsq') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeSummonQuilbeast[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANsw', udg_Unit) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANsw') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeSummonHawk[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("stampede") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Beastmasters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Beastmasters)
        if ( Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002C() ) then
            if ( Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
                set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001Func005002003))
                if ( Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001Func006C() ) then
                    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "summonwareagle")
                else
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
            else
                if ( Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
                    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001Func001Func003002003))
                    if ( Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Func001Func002Func001Func001Func004C() ) then
                        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "summonquillbeast")
                    else
                    endif
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
                    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast, 1.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast, function Trig_Summon_Hawk_and_Quilbeast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Stampede
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Stampede_Func001Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stampede_Func001Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stampede_Func001Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Stampede_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stampede_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANst') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeStampede[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stampede_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Beastmasters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stampede_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Stampede_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Beastmasters)
        if ( Trig_Stampede_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Stampede_Func001Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Stampede_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "stampede", udg_Point2)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Stampede takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Stampede=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Stampede, 1.80)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Stampede, function Trig_Stampede_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Breath of Fire
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Brewmasters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Func003Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Func003Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANbf') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeBreathOfFire[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Brewmasters)
    if ( Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(375.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Func003Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Func003Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "breathoffire", udg_Point2)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Breath_of_Fire takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Breath_of_Fire=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Breath_of_Fire, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Breath_of_Fire, Condition(function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Breath_of_Fire, function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001Func002Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANdh') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeDrunkenHaze[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Brewmasters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Drunken_Haze_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Brewmasters)
        if ( Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(550.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001Func002Func003Func003002003))
                if ( Trig_Drunken_Haze_Func001Func002Func003Func004C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "drunkenhaze", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Drunken_Haze=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Drunken_Haze, 1.70)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Drunken_Haze, function Trig_Drunken_Haze_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Storm Earth and Fire
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Npbm' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeStormEarthFire[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 60.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "elementalfury")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Storm_Earth_and_Fire takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Storm_Earth_and_Fire=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Storm_Earth_and_Fire, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Storm_Earth_and_Fire, Condition(function Trig_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Storm_Earth_and_Fire, function Trig_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Storm Earth and Fire is summoned
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_is_summoned_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSummonedUnit()) == 'npn2' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_is_summoned_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSummonedUnit()) == 'npn3' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_is_summoned_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSummonedUnit()) == 'npn1' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_is_summoned_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_is_summoned_Func001C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Storm)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_is_summoned_Func002C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Earth)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_is_summoned_Func003C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Fire)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_is_summoned takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_is_summoned=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_is_summoned, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SUMMON)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_is_summoned, function Trig_Storm_Earth_and_Fire_is_summoned_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func004002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func004002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANwk') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit, 'BOwk') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Storm) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Storm)
        if ( Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func004002003))
            if ( Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Func001Func003Func005C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "windwalk")
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Storm_Wind_Walk=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Storm_Wind_Walk, 1.74)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Storm_Wind_Walk, function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_StormWindWalkUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit, 'BOwk') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_StormWindWalkUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] != null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Storm) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_2_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Storm)
        if ( Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_StormWindWalkUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))]=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_2_Func002Func003C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "attack", udg_StormWindWalkUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))])
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Storm_Wind_Walk_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Storm_Wind_Walk_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Storm_Wind_Walk_2, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Storm_Wind_Walk_2, function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Storm Wind Walk Unit Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_StormWindWalkUnit[7] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_StormWindWalkUnit[8] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_StormWindWalkUnit[9] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_StormWindWalkUnit[10] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_StormWindWalkUnit[11] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_StormWindWalkUnit[12] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_StormWindWalkUnit[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=7
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_StormWindWalkUnit[GetForLoopIndexA()]=null
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Storm_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Storm_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Storm_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Storm_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies, function Trig_Storm_Wind_Walk_Unit_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Storm Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Storm_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'npn2' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_StormWindWalkUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=null
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Storm_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Storm_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Storm_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Storm_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Storm_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Storm_Dies, function Trig_Storm_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Earth Attacks
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Earth_Attacks_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'npn3' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Earth_Attacks_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "taunt")
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Earth_Attacks=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Earth_Attacks, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Earth_Attacks, Condition(function Trig_Earth_Attacks_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Earth_Attacks, function Trig_Earth_Attacks_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Silence Neutral
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Silence_Neutral_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Neutral_Func001Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Neutral_Func001Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Neutral_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Neutral_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Neutral_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Neutral_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSilenceNeutral[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANsi') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('ANsi', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANsi', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("drain") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Neutral_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DarkRangers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Silence_Neutral_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Silence_Neutral_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_DarkRangers)
        if ( Trig_Silence_Neutral_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Silence_Neutral_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Silence_Neutral_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "silence", udg_Point2)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Silence_Neutral takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Silence_Neutral=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Silence_Neutral, 2.10)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Silence_Neutral, function Trig_Silence_Neutral_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Autocast Black Arrow ON
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Autocast_Black_Arrow_ON_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetIssuedOrderIdBJ() == String2OrderIdBJ("blackarrowon") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Autocast_Black_Arrow_ON_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=LoadUnitHandleBJ(GetHandleIdBJ(GetTriggerUnit()), 0, udg_HeroTable)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "blackarrowon")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Autocast_Black_Arrow_ON takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Autocast_Black_Arrow_ON=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Autocast_Black_Arrow_ON, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ISSUED_ORDER)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Autocast_Black_Arrow_ON, Condition(function Trig_Autocast_Black_Arrow_ON_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Autocast_Black_Arrow_ON, function Trig_Autocast_Black_Arrow_ON_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "blackarrowoff")
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Autocast_Black_Arrow_OFF, function Trig_Autocast_Black_Arrow_OFF_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Life Drain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 75.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 75.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 75.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeLifeDrain[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANdr') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('ANdr', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANdr', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(udg_Unit) <= 90.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("drain") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DarkRangers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Drain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Life_Drain_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_DarkRangers)
        if ( Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "drain", udg_Unit2)
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func004Func001002003))
                if ( Trig_Life_Drain_Func001Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                    set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "drain", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Life_Drain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Life_Drain=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Life_Drain, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Life_Drain, function Trig_Life_Drain_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Charm
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 4)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 4)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 75.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 75.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 75.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeCharm[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANch') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('ANch', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANch', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("drain") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charm_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DarkRangers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charm_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Charm_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_DarkRangers)
        if ( Trig_Charm_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "charm", udg_Unit2)
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003))
                if ( Trig_Charm_Func001Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                    set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3)
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "charm", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Charm takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Charm=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Charm, 1.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Charm, function Trig_Charm_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Soul_Burn_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Burn_Func001Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Burn_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Burn_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Burn_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Burn_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSoulBurn[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANso') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('ANso', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANso', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("volcano") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Burn_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Firelords) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Burn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Soul_Burn_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Firelords)
        if ( Trig_Soul_Burn_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Soul_Burn_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Soul_Burn_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "soulburn", udg_Unit2)
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Soul_Burn_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003))
                if ( Trig_Soul_Burn_Func001Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                    set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3)
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "soulburn", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Soul_Burn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Soul_Burn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Soul_Burn, 1.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Soul_Burn, function Trig_Soul_Burn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lava Spawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lava_Spawn_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Nfir' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeLavaSpawn[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetAttacker()) != String2OrderIdBJ("volcano") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lava_Spawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "lavamonster")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lava_Spawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lava_Spawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Lava_Spawn, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Lava_Spawn, Condition(function Trig_Lava_Spawn_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lava_Spawn, function Trig_Lava_Spawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Volcano
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Volcano_Func001Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Func001Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Func001Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Func001Func003Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Func001Func003Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Func001Func003Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Func001Func003Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Func001Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeVolcano[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANvc') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('ANvc', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANvc', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Firelords) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Volcano_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Firelords)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        if ( Trig_Volcano_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Volcano_Func001Func003Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_Volcano_Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Volcano_Func001Func003Func003Func002002003))
                if ( Trig_Volcano_Func001Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "volcano", udg_Point2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Volcano takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Volcano=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Volcano, 2.20)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Volcano, function Trig_Volcano_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Volcano Point Check
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Volcano_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Point_Check_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_VolcanoActive[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Point_Check_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Volcano_Point_Check_Func001Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_VolcanoPoint[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))], Condition(function Trig_Volcano_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_Volcano_Point_Check_Func001Func001Func004C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "stop")
        else
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Volcano_Point_Check_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Firelords, function Trig_Volcano_Point_Check_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Volcano_Point_Check takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Volcano_Point_Check=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Volcano_Point_Check, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Volcano_Point_Check, function Trig_Volcano_Point_Check_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Rain of Fire
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001Func002Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeRainOfFire[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANrf') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('ANrf', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANrf', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("rainoffire") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_PitLords) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_PitLords)
        if ( Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001Func002Func004Func002002003))
                if ( Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func001Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "rainoffire", udg_Point2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Rain_of_Fire takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire, function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Howl_of_Terror_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Nplh' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeHowlOfTerror[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Howl_of_Terror_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Howl_of_Terror_Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Howl_of_Terror_Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Howl_of_Terror_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Howl_of_Terror_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Howl_of_Terror_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Howl_of_Terror_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), Condition(function Trig_Howl_of_Terror_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_Howl_of_Terror_Func003C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "howlofterror")
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Howl_of_Terror=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Howl_of_Terror, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Howl_of_Terror, Condition(function Trig_Howl_of_Terror_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Howl_of_Terror, function Trig_Howl_of_Terror_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Doom_Func001Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Doom_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeDoom[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'ANdo') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('ANdo', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANdo', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Doom_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_PitLords) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Doom_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Doom_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_PitLords)
        if ( Trig_Doom_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(650.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Doom_Func001Func002Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_Doom_Func001Func002Func004C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "doom", udg_Unit2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

// Trigger: Weaken Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Weaken_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_WeakenGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Weaken_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Weaken_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Weaken_Cast, function Trig_Weaken_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Weaken Check
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Weaken_Check_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_WeakenGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Weaken_Check_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B03D') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Weaken_Check_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Weaken_Check_Func001Func001C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_WeakenGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Weaken_Check_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_WeakenGroup, function Trig_Weaken_Check_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Weaken_Check=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Weaken_Check, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Weaken_Check, Condition(function Trig_Weaken_Check_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Weaken_Check, function Trig_Weaken_Check_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_LivingBombGroup)
endfunction
