//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Arcane Clarity
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Func003Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07H', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07H', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07H', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Func003Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + ( 0.03 * GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) ) ))
    else
        if ( Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
            call SetUnitManaBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + ( 0.04 * GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) ) ))
        else
            if ( Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Func003Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                call SetUnitManaBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + ( 0.05 * GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) ) ))
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Func002002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Func003A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Arcane_Clarity takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Arcane_Clarity=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Arcane_Clarity, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Arcane_Clarity, function Trig_Arcane_Clarity_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Refraction
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Refraction_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeRefraction[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Refraction_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "berserk")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Refraction takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Refraction=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Refraction, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Refraction, Condition(function Trig_AI_Refraction_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Refraction, function Trig_AI_Refraction_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Refraction 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Refraction_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeRefraction[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Refraction_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "berserk")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Refraction_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Refraction_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Refraction_2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Refraction_2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Refraction_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Refraction_2, function Trig_AI_Refraction_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Meld
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Meld_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_PhoenixAssassins) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_Func002Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_Func002Func005002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_Func002Func005002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_Func002Func005002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_Func002Func005002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_Func002Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_Func002Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_Func002Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeMeld[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A079') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit, 'B010') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_PhoenixAssassins)
    if ( Trig_AI_Meld_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Meld_Func002Func005002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Meld_Func002Func006C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "windwalk")
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Meld takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Meld=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Meld, 1.76)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Meld, Condition(function Trig_AI_Meld_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Meld, function Trig_AI_Meld_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Meld 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_PhoenixAssassins) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func002Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func002Func002002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd' )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func002Func002002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func002Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd'), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd'), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd'), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd'), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MeldUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit, 'B010') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MeldUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] != null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_PhoenixAssassins)
    if ( Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_MeldUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))]=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_AI_Meld_2_Func003C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "attack", udg_MeldUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Meld_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Meld_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Meld_2, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Meld_2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Meld_2, function Trig_AI_Meld_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Meld Unit Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Meld_Unit_Dies_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_MeldUnit[7] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_MeldUnit[8] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_MeldUnit[9] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_MeldUnit[10] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_MeldUnit[11] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_MeldUnit[12] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Meld_Unit_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Meld_Unit_Dies_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Meld_Unit_Dies_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_MeldUnit[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Meld_Unit_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=7
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Meld_Unit_Dies_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_MeldUnit[GetForLoopIndexA()]=null
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Meld_Unit_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Meld_Unit_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Meld_Unit_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Meld_Unit_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Meld_Unit_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Meld_Unit_Dies, function Trig_Meld_Unit_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Phoenix Assassin Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Phoenix_Assassin_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MeldUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=null
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Phoenix_Assassin_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Phoenix_Assassin_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Phoenix_Assassin_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Phoenix_Assassin_Dies, function Trig_Phoenix_Assassin_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Bladestorm BELF
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_SentinelCommanders) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF_Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF_Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeBladestormBELF[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A0D4') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('A0D4', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0D4', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_SentinelCommanders)
    if ( Trig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "whirlwind")
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Bladestorm_BELF=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Bladestorm_BELF, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Bladestorm_BELF, Condition(function Trig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Bladestorm_BELF, function Trig_AI_Bladestorm_BELF_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI SinDorei Blades
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_SinDorei_Blades_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSinDoreiBlades[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("whirlwind") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_SinDorei_Blades_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "metamorphosis")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_SinDorei_Blades takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_SinDorei_Blades=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_SinDorei_Blades, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_SinDorei_Blades, Condition(function Trig_AI_SinDorei_Blades_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_SinDorei_Blades, function Trig_AI_SinDorei_Blades_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Mana Burn BELF
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_SentinelCommanders) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeManaBurnBELF[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A0CG') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('A0CG', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0CG', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("whirlwind") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_SentinelCommanders)
    if ( Trig_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "manaburn", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF, Condition(function Trig_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF, function Trig_AI_Mana_Burn_BELF_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Berserkers Call
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Berserkers_Call_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeBerserkersCall[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttacker()) >= 20.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Berserkers_Call_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "taunt")
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Berserkers_Call, function Trig_AI_Berserkers_Call_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Func002Func004Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean

endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Func002Func004Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeShieldBash[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_BloodKnights)
    if ( Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "polymorph", udg_Unit2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Func002Func004Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Func002Func004Func004C() ) then
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Func002Func004Func004Func002002003))
                if ( Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Func002Func004Func004Func003C() ) then
                    set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3)
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "polymorph", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Shield_Bash takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Shield_Bash=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Shield_Bash, 0.80)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Shield_Bash, Condition(function Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Shield_Bash, function Trig_AI_Shield_Bash_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Havok
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Havok_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeHavok[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetAttacker()) != String2OrderIdBJ("scrollofspeed") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Havok_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderById(GetAttacker(), 852285)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Havok takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Havok=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Havok, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Havok, Condition(function Trig_AI_Havok_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Havok, function Trig_AI_Havok_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Rain of Chaos
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Sunreavers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeRainOfChaos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A07F') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('A07F', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07F', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("drain") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Sunreavers)
    if ( Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
            call IssuePointOrderByIdLoc(udg_Unit, 852237, udg_Point2)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004Func002Func002002003))
                if ( Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Func002Func004Func002Func003C() ) then
                    call IssuePointOrderByIdLoc(udg_Unit, 852237, udg_Point2)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Rain_of_Chaos=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Rain_of_Chaos, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Rain_of_Chaos, Condition(function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Rain_of_Chaos, function Trig_AI_Rain_of_Chaos_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Liberate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Liberate_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Sunreavers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterUnit() != udg_Unit )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetFilterUnit() != udg_Unit)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetFilterUnit() != udg_Unit)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetFilterUnit() != udg_Unit)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func001002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func001002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterUnit() != udg_Unit )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3), (GetFilterUnit() != udg_Unit)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3), (GetFilterUnit() != udg_Unit)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3), (GetFilterUnit() != udg_Unit)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func002Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func002Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func002Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterUnit() != udg_Unit )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanOr((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetFilterUnit() != udg_Unit)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanOr((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetFilterUnit() != udg_Unit)))) // INLINED!!

    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func004002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeLiberate[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Sunreavers)
    if ( Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(350.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func004002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func005C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "unholyfrenzy", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(350.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func002Func004002003))
                if ( Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func002Func005C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "unholyfrenzy", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func002Func001002003))
                if ( Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func002Func002C() ) then
                    set udg_UnitGroup4=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(350.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func002Func002Func001002003))
                    if ( Trig_AI_Liberate_Func002Func004Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "unholyfrenzy", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3))
                    else
                    endif
                    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup4)
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Liberate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Liberate=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Liberate, 0.75)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Liberate, Condition(function Trig_AI_Liberate_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Liberate, function Trig_AI_Liberate_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Sunreavers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )

    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Func002Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Func002Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSiphonLifeMana[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Sunreavers)
    if ( Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderById(udg_Unit, 852487, udg_Unit2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Func002Func004Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                call IssueTargetOrderById(udg_Unit, 852487, udg_Unit2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana, 0.75)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana, Condition(function Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana, function Trig_AI_Siphon_Life_and_Mana_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Concentration
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Concentration_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeConcentration[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Concentration_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "berserk")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Concentration takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Concentration=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Concentration, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Concentration, Condition(function Trig_AI_Concentration_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Concentration, function Trig_AI_Concentration_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Slow BELF
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Darkcasters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func003Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func003Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func003Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSlowBloodElf[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Darkcasters)
    if ( Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "slow", udg_Unit2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func003Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "slow", udg_Unit2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Slow_BELF takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Slow_BELF=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Slow_BELF, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Slow_BELF, Condition(function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Slow_BELF, function Trig_AI_Slow_BELF_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Silver Edge Form
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Darkcasters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e014' )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e014'), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "unravenform")
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h034' )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h034'), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSilverEdgeForm[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004Func005Func001C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "ravenform")
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Darkcasters)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func003002003))
    if ( Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004Func004002003))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup2, function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004Func005A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004Func001002003))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup2, function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Func004Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Silver_Edge_Form=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Silver_Edge_Form, 0.75)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Silver_Edge_Form, Condition(function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Silver_Edge_Form, function Trig_AI_Silver_Edge_Form_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Dragonhawk Rider Mana Decay
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DragonhawkRidersBE) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 40.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitManaPercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 40.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 40.00), (GetUnitManaPercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 40.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 40.00), (GetUnitManaPercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 40.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 40.00), (GetUnitManaPercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 40.00)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func004Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 40.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 40.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeManaDecay[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeManaDecay[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_DragonhawkRidersBE)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func003002003))
    if ( Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func004C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "drain", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
    else
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(450.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func004Func001002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Func004Func002C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "drain", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
        else
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay, 0.40)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay, Condition(function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay, function Trig_AI_Dragonhawk_Rider_Mana_Decay_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petal_Ward_Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petal_Ward_Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petal_Ward_Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petal_Ward_Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petal_Ward_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petal_Ward_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petal_Ward_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activePetalWard[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petal_Ward_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Maguses)
    if ( Trig_AI_Petal_Ward_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Petal_Ward_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Petal_Ward_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Point2=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point, 200.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Unit))
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "healingward", udg_Point2)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Petal_Ward takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Petal_Ward=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Petal_Ward, 1.30)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Petal_Ward, Condition(function Trig_AI_Petal_Ward_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Petal_Ward, function Trig_AI_Petal_Ward_Actions)
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Sun_Blast_Func002Func004Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Sun_Blast_Func002Func004Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Sun_Blast_Func002Func004Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction
