    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Sun_Blast_Func002Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Sun_Blast_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Sun_Blast_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSunBlast[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Sun_Blast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Maguses)
    if ( Trig_AI_Sun_Blast_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Sun_Blast_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Sun_Blast_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Sun_Blast_Func002Func004Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Sun_Blast_Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "rainoffire", udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Sun_Blast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Sun_Blast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Sun_Blast, 0.70)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Sun_Blast, Condition(function Trig_AI_Sun_Blast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Sun_Blast, function Trig_AI_Sun_Blast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Arcane Rush
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Maguses) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func004Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func004Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func004Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func004Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func004Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func004Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func004Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeArcaneRush[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Maguses)
    if ( Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func004Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "blink", udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Arcane_Rush takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Arcane_Rush=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Arcane_Rush, 0.70)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Arcane_Rush, Condition(function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Arcane_Rush, function Trig_AI_Arcane_Rush_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Verbis Virtus
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Verbis_Virtus_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Magisters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Verbis_Virtus_Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Verbis_Virtus_Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Verbis_Virtus_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Verbis_Virtus_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Verbis_Virtus_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeVerbisVirtus[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Verbis_Virtus_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Magisters)
    if ( Trig_AI_Verbis_Virtus_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Verbis_Virtus_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Verbis_Virtus_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "healingwave", udg_Unit2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Verbis_Virtus takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Verbis_Virtus=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Verbis_Virtus, 0.90)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Verbis_Virtus, Condition(function Trig_AI_Verbis_Virtus_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Verbis_Virtus, function Trig_AI_Verbis_Virtus_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Liberate Shield
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Magisters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B025') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B025') == false), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B025') == false), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func003Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B025') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B025') == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func003Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_Unit2) != 'ushd' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeLiberateShield[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Magisters)
    if ( Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "innerfire", udg_Unit2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func003Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                if ( Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Func002Func003Func002Func002C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "innerfire", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Liberate_Shield takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Liberate_Shield=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Liberate_Shield, 0.55)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Liberate_Shield, Condition(function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Liberate_Shield, function Trig_AI_Liberate_Shield_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Relocate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Relocate_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetTriggerUnit()) != String2OrderIdBJ("massteleport") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Relocate_Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Relocate_Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Relocate_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Relocate_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Relocate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_Point3=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point2, 750.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_Point2, udg_Point))
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Relocate_Func004002003))
    if ( Trig_AI_Relocate_Func005C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "massteleport", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
    else
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point3)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Relocate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Relocate=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Relocate, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Relocate, Condition(function Trig_AI_Relocate_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Relocate, function Trig_AI_Relocate_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Ember Cannon Mode
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Ember_Cannon_Mode_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeEmberCannonMode[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Ember_Cannon_Mode_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "stoneform")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Ember_Cannon_Mode takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Ember_Cannon_Mode=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Ember_Cannon_Mode, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Ember_Cannon_Mode, Condition(function Trig_AI_Ember_Cannon_Mode_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Ember_Cannon_Mode, function Trig_AI_Ember_Cannon_Mode_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Decimator Mode
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Decimator_Mode_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_EmberCannonMode) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Decimator_Mode_Func001Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Decimator_Mode_Func001Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Decimator_Mode_Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Decimator_Mode_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Decimator_Mode_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(950.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Decimator_Mode_Func001Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_AI_Decimator_Mode_Func001Func003C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "unstoneform")
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Decimator_Mode_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_EmberCannonMode, function Trig_AI_Decimator_Mode_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Decimator_Mode takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Decimator_Mode=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Decimator_Mode, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Decimator_Mode, Condition(function Trig_AI_Decimator_Mode_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Decimator_Mode, function Trig_AI_Decimator_Mode_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hook Init
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hook_Init_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call InitHashtableBJ()
    set udg_HookTable=GetLastCreatedHashtableBJ()
    call InitHashtableBJ()
    set udg_HookDummyPointTable=GetLastCreatedHashtableBJ()
    call InitHashtableBJ()
    set udg_HookDummyCountTable=GetLastCreatedHashtableBJ()
    call InitHashtableBJ()
    set udg_HookDummyDoPullTable=GetLastCreatedHashtableBJ()
    call InitHashtableBJ()
    set udg_HookDummyEffectTable=GetLastCreatedHashtableBJ()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hook_Init takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hook_Init=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hook_Init, function Trig_Hook_Init_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unit Casts Hook
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unit_Casts_Hook_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_HookCasterGroup)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_HookGroup)
    call SaveUnitHandleBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 0, GetHandleIdBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit()), udg_HookTable)
    call SaveUnitHandleBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), GetHandleIdBJ(GetTriggerUnit()), 0, udg_HookTable)
    call SaveBooleanBJ(false, 0, GetHandleIdBJ(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_HookDummyDoPullTable)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call SaveLocationHandleBJ(udg_Point, 0, GetHandleIdBJ(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_HookDummyPointTable)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Hook_Periodic)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unit_Casts_Hook takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unit_Casts_Hook=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Unit_Casts_Hook, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unit_Casts_Hook, function Trig_Unit_Casts_Hook_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hook Periodic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hook_Periodic_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_HookCasterGroup) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hook_Periodic_Func002Func001Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hook_Periodic_Func002Func001Func022C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_Point, udg_Point2) <= 60.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hook_Periodic_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( LoadBooleanBJ(0, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_HookDummyDoPullTable) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hook_Periodic_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Hook_Periodic_Func002Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=( LoadIntegerBJ(0, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_HookDummyCountTable) + 0 )
        set udg_Point=LoadLocationHandleBJ(udg_Integer, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_HookDummyPointTable)
        set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(LoadUnitHandleBJ(GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), 0, udg_HookTable))
        set udg_Real=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_Point, udg_Point2)
        set udg_Point3=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point, 50.00, udg_Real)
        set udg_Integer=( LoadIntegerBJ(0, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_HookDummyCountTable) + 1 )
        call SaveLocationHandleBJ(udg_Point3, udg_Integer, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_HookDummyPointTable)
        call SaveIntegerBJ(udg_Integer, 0, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_HookDummyCountTable)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point3, "Abilities\\Weapons\\WardenMissile\\WardenMissile.mdl")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectYaw(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), ( udg_Real * ( 3.14 / 180.00 ) ))
        call SaveEffectHandleBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), udg_Integer, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_HookDummyEffectTable)
        if ( Trig_Hook_Periodic_Func002Func001Func022C() ) then
            call SaveBooleanBJ(true, 0, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_HookDummyDoPullTable)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(LoadEffectHandleBJ(udg_Integer, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_HookDummyEffectTable))
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point3)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
    else
        set udg_Integer=( LoadIntegerBJ(0, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_HookDummyCountTable) - 1 )
        call SaveIntegerBJ(udg_Integer, 0, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_HookDummyCountTable)
        set udg_Point=LoadLocationHandleBJ(udg_Integer, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_HookDummyPointTable)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(LoadEffectHandleBJ(udg_Integer, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_HookDummyEffectTable))
        set udg_Unit=LoadUnitHandleBJ(GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), 0, udg_HookTable)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit, udg_Point)
        call SetUnitPathing(udg_Unit, false)
        if ( Trig_Hook_Periodic_Func002Func001Func009C() ) then
            call SetUnitPathing(udg_Unit, true)
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_HookCasterGroup)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Hook_Periodic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Hook_Periodic_Func001C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HookCasterGroup, function Trig_Hook_Periodic_Func002A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hook_Periodic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hook_Periodic=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Hook_Periodic)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Hook_Periodic, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hook_Periodic, function Trig_Hook_Periodic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unit Finishes Casting Hook
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unit_Finishes_Casting_Hook_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_HookGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unit_Finishes_Casting_Hook takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unit_Finishes_Casting_Hook=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Unit_Finishes_Casting_Hook, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Unit_Finishes_Casting_Hook, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_ENDCAST)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unit_Finishes_Casting_Hook, function Trig_Unit_Finishes_Casting_Hook_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shadows Call Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shadows_Call_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A080', GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_ShadowsCallGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shadows_Call_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shadows_Call_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Shadows_Call_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shadows_Call_Cast, function Trig_Shadows_Call_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shadows Call
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shadows_Call_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01P') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadows_Call_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Shadows_Call_Func001Func001C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A080', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A080', GetEnumUnit())
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_ShadowsCallGroup)
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Shadows_Call_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ShadowsCallGroup, function Trig_Shadows_Call_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shadows_Call takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shadows_Call=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Shadows_Call, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shadows_Call, function Trig_Shadows_Call_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fade Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fade_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 50.00)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A080', GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_FadeGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fade_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fade_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Fade_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fade_Cast, function Trig_Fade_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fade
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fade_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01K') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fade_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Fade_Func001Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 50.00)
    else
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 0.00)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_FadeGroup)
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Fade_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_FadeGroup, function Trig_Fade_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fade takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fade=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Fade, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fade, function Trig_Fade_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blight Spread
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blight_Spread_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetBlightRadiusLocBJ(true, GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), udg_Point, 325.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blight_Spread takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blight_Spread=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Blight_Spread, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Blight_Spread, function Trig_Blight_Spread_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fateful Strike
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fateful_Strike_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A1', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fateful_Strike_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A1', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fateful_Strike_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A1', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fateful_Strike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.40)
    if ( Trig_Fateful_Strike_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
        set udg_BlackStrike[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetUnitPathing(udg_BlackStrike[1], false)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', udg_BlackStrike[1])
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_BlackStrike[1], "thunderclap")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Fateful_Strike_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
        set udg_BlackStrike[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetUnitPathing(udg_BlackStrike[2], false)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', udg_BlackStrike[2])
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_BlackStrike[2], "thunderclap")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Fateful_Strike_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
        set udg_BlackStrike[3]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetUnitPathing(udg_BlackStrike[3], false)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', udg_BlackStrike[3])
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_BlackStrike[3], "thunderclap")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fateful_Strike takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fateful_Strike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Fateful_Strike, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fateful_Strike, function Trig_Fateful_Strike_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Banshee Scream Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_BansheeScreamCaster[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_isCastingBansheeScream[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=true
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "AlternateBansheeQueen.mdx")
    set udg_BansheeScreamEffect[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.15)
    call BlzPlaySpecialEffect(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), ANIM_TYPE_SPELL)
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectYaw(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), ( GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()) * ( 3.14 / 180.00 ) ))
    call ShowUnitHide(GetTriggerUnit())
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_BansheeScreamInitTimer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], false, 1.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Banshee_Scream_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Banshee_Scream_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Banshee_Scream_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Banshee_Scream_Cast, function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Banshee Scream Start
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func006002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func006002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func006002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func006002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func006002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func006002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func006002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func006002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func006002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func009Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func009Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func009Func001002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func009Func001002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func009Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func009Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func009Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) < 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "possession", GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(GetExpiredTimer()) <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_isCastingBansheeScream[GetForLoopIndexA()] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_isCastingBansheeScream[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
            set udg_Unit=udg_BansheeScreamCaster[GetForLoopIndexA()]
            call ShowUnitShow(udg_Unit)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_BansheeScreamEffect[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_BansheeScreamCaster[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(900.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func006002003))
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetRandomSubGroup(3, udg_UnitGroup)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
            if ( Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func009C() ) then
                set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(900.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func009Func001002003))
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetRandomSubGroup(( 3 - CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) ), udg_UnitGroup)
                call GroupAddGroup(udg_UnitGroup3, udg_UnitGroup2)
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            else
            endif
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup2, function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Func001Func001Func010A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Banshee_Scream_Start takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Banshee_Scream_Start=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Banshee_Scream_Start, udg_BansheeScreamInitTimer[1])
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Banshee_Scream_Start, udg_BansheeScreamInitTimer[7])
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Banshee_Scream_Start, udg_BansheeScreamInitTimer[8])
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Banshee_Scream_Start, udg_BansheeScreamInitTimer[9])
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Banshee_Scream_Start, udg_BansheeScreamInitTimer[10])
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Banshee_Scream_Start, udg_BansheeScreamInitTimer[11])
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Banshee_Scream_Start, udg_BansheeScreamInitTimer[12])
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Banshee_Scream_Start, function Trig_Banshee_Scream_Start_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Grave Blow
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Grave_Blow_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A2', GetSpellAbilityUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Grave_Blow_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A2', GetSpellAbilityUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Grave_Blow_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A2', GetSpellAbilityUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Grave_Blow_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    if ( Trig_Grave_Blow_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), 50.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        set udg_GraveBlowStun=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', udg_GraveBlowStun)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_GraveBlowStun, "thunderbolt", GetSpellTargetUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Grave_Blow_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), 70.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        set udg_GraveBlowStun=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', udg_GraveBlowStun)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_GraveBlowStun, "thunderbolt", GetSpellTargetUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Grave_Blow_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), 90.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        set udg_GraveBlowStun=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', udg_GraveBlowStun)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_GraveBlowStun, "thunderbolt", GetSpellTargetUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Grave_Blow takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Grave_Blow=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Grave_Blow, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Grave_Blow, function Trig_Grave_Blow_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blight Aura
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blight_Aura_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Reapers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blight_Aura_Func001Func001Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Blight_Aura_Func001Func001Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blight_Aura_Func001Func001Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == false), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blight_Aura_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blight_Aura_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Blight_Aura_Func001Func001C() ) then
        set udg_BlightAuraLevelTemp[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))]=GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0DR', GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(900.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Blight_Aura_Func001Func001Func003002003))
        call GroupAddGroup(udg_UnitGroup, udg_BlightAuraGroup[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))])
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Blight_Aura_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BlightAuraLevelTemp[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blight_Aura_Func002Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BlightAuraLevelTemp[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blight_Aura_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BlightAuraLevelTemp[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blight_Aura_Func002Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Blight_Aura_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 2.00 ))
    else
        if ( Trig_Blight_Aura_Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
            call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 3.00 ))
        else
            if ( Trig_Blight_Aura_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 4.00 ))
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Blight_Aura_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Reapers, function Trig_Blight_Aura_Func001A)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=7
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_BlightAuraGroup[GetForLoopIndexA()], function Trig_Blight_Aura_Func002Func001A)
        call GroupClear(udg_BlightAuraGroup[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blight_Aura takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blight_Aura=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Blight_Aura, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Blight_Aura, Condition(function Trig_Blight_Aura_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Blight_Aura, function Trig_Blight_Aura_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Punish New
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Punish_New_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A5', GetAttacker()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_PunishTimer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))]) <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Punish_New_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A5', GetAttacker()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Punish_New_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A5', GetAttacker()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Punish_New_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A5', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Punish_New_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetTriggerUnit(), 50.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    if ( Trig_Punish_New_Func002C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_PunishTimer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))], false, 10.00)
    else
        if ( Trig_Punish_New_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call StartTimerBJ(udg_PunishTimer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))], false, 8.00)
        else
            if ( Trig_Punish_New_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call StartTimerBJ(udg_PunishTimer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))], false, 6.00)
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Punish_New takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Punish_New=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Punish_New, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Punish_New, Condition(function Trig_Punish_New_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Punish_New, function Trig_Punish_New_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Corpse Consume
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Corpse_Consume_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Deathstalkers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Corpse_Consume_Func001Func001Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Corpse_Consume_Func001Func001Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Corpse_Consume_Func001Func001Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Corpse_Consume_Func001Func001Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (IsUnitDeadBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Corpse_Consume_Func001Func001Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (IsUnitDeadBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Corpse_Consume_Func001Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Corpse_Consume_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0CI', GetEnumUnit()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Corpse_Consume_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Corpse_Consume_Func001Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(512, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Corpse_Consume_Func001Func001Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_Corpse_Consume_Func001Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
            set udg_Real=( 25.00 + ( I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0CI', GetEnumUnit())) * 50.00 ) )
            call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + udg_Real ))
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathCoil\\DeathCoilSpecialArt.mdl")
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point2, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathCoil\\DeathCoilSpecialArt.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call RemoveUnit(udg_Unit)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Corpse_Consume_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Deathstalkers, function Trig_Corpse_Consume_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Corpse_Consume takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Corpse_Consume=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Corpse_Consume, 10.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Corpse_Consume, Condition(function Trig_Corpse_Consume_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Corpse_Consume, function Trig_Corpse_Consume_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Contract Kill
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Contract_Kill_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Y', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Contract_Kill_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Y', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Contract_Kill_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Y', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Contract_Kill_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Contract_Kill_Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetKillingUnitBJ()) + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetKillingUnitBJ()) * 0.08 ) ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Contract_Kill_Func002C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetKillingUnitBJ()) + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetKillingUnitBJ()) * 0.12 ) ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Contract_Kill_Func003C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetKillingUnitBJ()) + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetKillingUnitBJ()) * 0.16 ) ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Contract_Kill takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Contract_Kill=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Contract_Kill, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Contract_Kill, function Trig_Contract_Kill_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Grave Blow
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Reapers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002Func004Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002Func004Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002Func004Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeGraveBlow[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Reapers)
    if ( Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "forkedlightning", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002Func004Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "forkedlightning", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Grave_Blow takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Grave_Blow=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Grave_Blow, 0.75)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Grave_Blow, Condition(function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Grave_Blow, function Trig_AI_Grave_Blow_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Dread
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Dread_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeDread[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0A0') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dread_Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dread_Func004002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dread_Func004002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dread_Func004002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dread_Func004002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dread_Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dread_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dread_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Dread_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Dread_Func004002003))
    if ( Trig_AI_Dread_Func005C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "howlofterror")
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Dread takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Dread=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Dread, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Dread, Condition(function Trig_AI_Dread_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Dread, function Trig_AI_Dread_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Life Drain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_BansheeMaidens) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func004Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func004Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func004Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 50.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeLifeDrainForsaken[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A099') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('A099', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A099', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(udg_Unit) < 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("drain") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_BansheeMaidens)
    if ( Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "drain", udg_Unit2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func004Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "drain", udg_Unit2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Life_Drain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Life_Drain=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Life_Drain, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Life_Drain, Condition(function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Life_Drain, function Trig_AI_Life_Drain_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: AI Remorseless
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Remorseless_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeRemorseless[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0AB') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Remorseless_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrder(GetAttacker(), "frenzy")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Remorseless takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Remorseless=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Remorseless, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Remorseless, Condition(function Trig_AI_Remorseless_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Remorseless, function Trig_AI_Remorseless_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Banshee_Scream_Func002Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Banshee_Scream_Func002Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Banshee_Scream_Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Banshee_Scream_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Banshee_Scream_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Banshee_Scream_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Banshee_Scream_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeBansheeScream[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A07E') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Banshee_Scream_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_BansheeMaidens)
    if ( Trig_AI_Banshee_Scream_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(900.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Banshee_Scream_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Banshee_Scream_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "roar")
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Banshee_Scream takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Banshee_Scream=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Banshee_Scream, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Banshee_Scream, Condition(function Trig_AI_Banshee_Scream_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Banshee_Scream, function Trig_AI_Banshee_Scream_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

endfunction
