    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Punish_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Punish_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activePunish[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Punish_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Deathstalkers)
    if ( Trig_AI_Punish_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Punish_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Punish_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "shadowstrike", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Punish_Func002Func004Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Punish_Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "shadowstrike", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Punish takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Punish=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Punish, 0.75)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Punish, Condition(function Trig_AI_Punish_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Punish, function Trig_AI_Punish_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Death Bound
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Deathstalkers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func004002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func004002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005Func003Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005Func003Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeDeathBound[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A09Z') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Deathstalkers)
    if ( Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func004002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "doom", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005Func003Func002002003))
                if ( Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Func002Func005Func003Func003C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "doom", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Death_Bound takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Death_Bound=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Death_Bound, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Death_Bound, Condition(function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Death_Bound, function Trig_AI_Death_Bound_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Vile Blast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Exterminators) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002Func004Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002Func004Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002Func004Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002Func004Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002Func004Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeVileBlast[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A0AA') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('A0AA', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AA', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("tornado") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Exterminators)
    if ( Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002Func004Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "flamestrike", udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Vile_Blast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Vile_Blast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Vile_Blast, 1.20)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Vile_Blast, Condition(function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Vile_Blast, function Trig_AI_Vile_Blast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Plague
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Plague_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activePlague[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0A4') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetAttacker()) != String2OrderIdBJ("flamestrike") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Plague_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "locustswarm")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Plague takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Plague=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Plague, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Plague, Condition(function Trig_AI_Plague_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Plague, function Trig_AI_Plague_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0A3') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetAttacker()) != String2OrderIdBJ("flamestrike") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Greater_Abomination_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "spiritwolf")
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Greater_Abomination, Condition(function Trig_AI_Greater_Abomination_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Greater_Abomination, function Trig_AI_Greater_Abomination_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Potent Remedy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Potent_Remedy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Apothecarys) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Potent_Remedy_Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Potent_Remedy_Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Potent_Remedy_Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Potent_Remedy_Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Potent_Remedy_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Potent_Remedy_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Potent_Remedy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A09E') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activePotentRemedy[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Potent_Remedy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Apothecarys)
    if ( Trig_AI_Potent_Remedy_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Potent_Remedy_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Potent_Remedy_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "rejuvination", udg_Unit2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Potent_Remedy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Potent_Remedy=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Potent_Remedy, 0.70)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Potent_Remedy, Condition(function Trig_AI_Potent_Remedy_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Potent_Remedy, function Trig_AI_Potent_Remedy_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func004Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func004Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func004Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B03A') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func004Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B03A') == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func004Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B03A') == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func004Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func004Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func004Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func004Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup4) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A0C1') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeForsakenConcoction[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Apothecarys)
    if ( Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func002002003))
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func004Func003002003))
            set udg_UnitGroup4=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func004Func004002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Func002Func004Func005C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "acidbomb", udg_Unit2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup4)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Forsaken_Concoction=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Forsaken_Concoction, 0.70)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Forsaken_Concoction, Condition(function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Forsaken_Concoction, function Trig_AI_Forsaken_Concoction_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Death Fumes
//===========================================================================

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Func002Func003Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Func002Func003Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Func002Func003Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Func002Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A08W') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("healingspray") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeAcerbicPotion[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Apothecarys)
    if ( Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Func002Func003Func003002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Func002Func003Func004C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "healingward", udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Death_Fumes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Death_Fumes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Death_Fumes, 0.80)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Death_Fumes, Condition(function Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Death_Fumes, function Trig_AI_Death_Fumes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Hook
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Hook_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_AbominationsForsaken) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0) >= 650.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0) >= 650.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0) >= 650.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func004Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func004Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func004Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0) >= 400.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0) >= 400.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0) >= 400.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func004Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_Unit2, udg_HookGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_Point, udg_Point2) >= 450.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func004Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_Unit2, udg_HookGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_Point, udg_Point2) >= 500.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeHook[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A0CX') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hook_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_AbominationsForsaken)
    if ( Trig_AI_Hook_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(850.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
            if ( Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func004Func006C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "chainlightning", udg_Unit2)
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(850.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func004Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit2)
                if ( Trig_AI_Hook_Func002Func004Func002Func003C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "chainlightning", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Hook takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Hook=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Hook, 0.30)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Hook, Condition(function Trig_AI_Hook_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Hook, function Trig_AI_Hook_Actions)
endfunction

    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Spectres) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Consume_NEW_Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Consume_NEW_Func003Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 0.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Consume_NEW_Func003Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitManaPercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 35.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Consume_NEW_Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 0.00), (GetUnitManaPercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 35.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Consume_NEW_Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 0.00), (GetUnitManaPercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 35.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Consume_NEW_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Spectres)
    if ( Trig_AI_Consume_NEW_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(850.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Consume_NEW_Func003Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Consume_NEW_Func003Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "absorb", udg_Unit2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Fade
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Fade_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) < 90.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Fade_Func001Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'u00N' )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Fade_Func001Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Fade_Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'u00N'), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Fade_Func001Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeFade[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Fade_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Fade_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Spectres) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Fade_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_AI_Fade_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Fade_Func001Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Fade_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            if ( Trig_AI_Fade_Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "unholyfrenzy", GetTriggerUnit())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Fade takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Fade=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Fade, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Fade, Condition(function Trig_AI_Fade_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Fade, function Trig_AI_Fade_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Petrify
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Petrify_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Gorgons) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B018') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B018') == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B018') == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B018') == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func004Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func004Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func004Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B018') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B018') == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B018') == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activePetrify[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Petrify_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Gorgons)
    if ( Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "sleep", udg_Unit2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func004Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Petrify_Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3)
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "sleep", udg_Unit2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Petrify takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Petrify=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Petrify, 0.65)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Petrify, Condition(function Trig_AI_Petrify_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Petrify, function Trig_AI_Petrify_Actions)
endfunction

        return false

            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "animatedead")
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)

    endif
endfunction

    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Salubrious_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSalubrious[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A08A') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Salubrious_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Wraithblades)
    if ( Trig_AI_Salubrious_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Salubrious_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Salubrious_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "healingwave", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Salubrious takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Salubrious=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Salubrious, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Salubrious, Condition(function Trig_AI_Salubrious_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Salubrious, function Trig_AI_Salubrious_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Undead Embrace
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Valkyrs) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Func002Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Func002Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 3), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 3), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 3), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 75.00)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeUndeadEmbrace[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A09W') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Valkyrs)
    if ( Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "deathcoil", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Undead_Embrace takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Undead_Embrace=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Undead_Embrace, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Undead_Embrace, Condition(function Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Undead_Embrace, function Trig_AI_Undead_Embrace_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Magical Skin
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Magical_Skin_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "slow", GetAttacker())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
