    set gg_trg_Magical_Skin=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Magical_Skin, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Magical_Skin, function Trig_Magical_Skin_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Murloc Acid
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Murloc_Acid_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Murloc_Acid_Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Murloc_Acid_Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Murloc_Acid_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Murloc_Acid_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Murloc_Acid_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 35.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Murloc_Acid_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(150.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Murloc_Acid_Func002002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_Murloc_Acid_Func003A)
    set udg_Unit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', udg_Unit)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "acidbomb", GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Murloc_Acid takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Murloc_Acid=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Murloc_Acid, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Murloc_Acid, function Trig_Murloc_Acid_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Couatl Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Couatl_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "birth")
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_CouatlEggGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Couatl_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Couatl_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Couatl_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Couatl_Dies, function Trig_Couatl_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Couatl Egg Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Couatl_Egg_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_CouatlEggGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Couatl_Egg_Dies_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) >= 10.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Couatl_Egg_Dies_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Couatl_Egg_Dies_Func001Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()))
        call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_CouatlEggGroup)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Couatl_Egg_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_CouatlEggGroup, function Trig_Couatl_Egg_Dies_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Couatl_Egg_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Couatl_Egg_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Couatl_Egg_Dies, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Couatl_Egg_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Couatl_Egg_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Couatl_Egg_Dies, function Trig_Couatl_Egg_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Siren Aura
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Siren_Aura_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func001Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func001Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func001Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func001Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 90.00 ))
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetFilterUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetFilterUnit()) + 90.00 ))
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'B02P') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 60.00 ))
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetFilterUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetFilterUnit()) + 60.00 ))
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'B02N') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 30.00 ))
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetFilterUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetFilterUnit()) + 30.00 ))
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'B02O') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Siren_Aura_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func003002003))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func004A)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
        if ( Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func003002003))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func004A)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
            if ( Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
                set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func001Func002002003))
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_Siren_Aura_Func001Func001Func001Func003A)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Siren_Aura takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Siren_Aura=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Siren_Aura, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Siren_Aura, Condition(function Trig_Siren_Aura_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Siren_Aura, function Trig_Siren_Aura_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Malediction
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Malediction_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetSpellTargetUnit()) * 0.60 ))
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetSpellTargetUnit()) * 0.60 ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Malediction takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Malediction=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Malediction, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Malediction, function Trig_Malediction_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gust
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gust_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Naga\\NagaDeath\\NagaDeath.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "acidbomb", GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gust takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gust=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Gust, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Gust, function Trig_Gust_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ravage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ravage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Integer=7
    set udg_Real=0.00
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_Integer
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        set udg_Real=( udg_Real + ( 360.00 / I2R(GetForLoopIndexA()) ) )
        set udg_Point2=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point, 256, udg_Real)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "impale", udg_Point2)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ravage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ravage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Ravage, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ravage, function Trig_Ravage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kraken Shell
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kraken_Shell_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetAttacker(), 'B02Q') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 5) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kraken_Shell_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveBuffsExBJ(bj_BUFF_POLARITY_NEGATIVE, bj_BUFF_RESIST_EITHER, GetAttacker(), false, false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kraken_Shell takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kraken_Shell=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Kraken_Shell, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Kraken_Shell, Condition(function Trig_Kraken_Shell_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Kraken_Shell, function Trig_Kraken_Shell_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Termal Eruption
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Naga\\NagaDeath\\NagaDeath.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderclap")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Termal_Eruption takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Termal_Eruption=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Termal_Eruption, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Termal_Eruption, function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Aqua Burst
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Aqua_Burst_Func006002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Aqua_Burst_Func006002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Aqua_Burst_Func006002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Aqua_Burst_Func007Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0B0', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aqua_Burst_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0B0', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aqua_Burst_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0B0', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aqua_Burst_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), udg_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Aqua_Burst_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Point)
    call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellAbilityId(), BlzGetAbilityRealLevelField(BlzGetUnitAbility(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellAbilityId()), ABILITY_RLF_COOLDOWN, GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(GetSpellAbilityId(), GetTriggerUnit())))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Naga\\NagaDeath\\NagaDeath.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Aqua_Burst_Func006002003))
    if ( Trig_Aqua_Burst_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_Real=100.00
    else
        if ( Trig_Aqua_Burst_Func007Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Real=150.00
        else
            if ( Trig_Aqua_Burst_Func007Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_Real=200.00
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_Aqua_Burst_Func008A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Aqua_Burst takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Aqua_Burst=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Aqua_Burst, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Aqua_Burst, function Trig_Aqua_Burst_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Vortex Aura
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_RoyalCommanders) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func001Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func001Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func001Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 1.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func001Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 1.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 1.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(900.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func001Func002002003))
    call GroupAddGroup(udg_UnitGroup, udg_VortexAuraGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func002Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02S') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02T') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02U') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func002Func001C() ) then
    else
        if ( Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
        else
            if ( Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_RoyalCommanders, function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func001A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_VortexAuraGroup, function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Func002A)
    call GroupClear(udg_VortexAuraGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Vortex_Aura takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Vortex_Aura=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Vortex_Aura, 2)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Vortex_Aura, Condition(function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Vortex_Aura, function Trig_Vortex_Aura_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Razor Edge
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Razor_Edge_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPathing(GetTriggerUnit(), false)
    set udg_isRazorEdgeOn[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=true
    set udg_RazorEdgeCaster[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=GetTriggerUnit()
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_RazorEdgeGroup)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Point2=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_RazorEdgeEndLoc[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point, 500.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_Point, udg_Point2))
    call SetUnitAnimationWithRarity(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack, walk, stand, spin", RARITY_RARE)
    call GroupClear(udg_UnitGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Razor_Edge_Periodic)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Razor_Edge takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Razor_Edge=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Razor_Edge, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Razor_Edge, function Trig_Razor_Edge_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Razor Edge Periodic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_Point, udg_Point2) >= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001Func005002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001Func005002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001Func005002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), udg_RazorEdgeTargets[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001Func005002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), udg_RazorEdgeTargets[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), udg_RazorEdgeTargets[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), udg_RazorEdgeTargets[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Unit, GetEnumUnit(), ( 70.00 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AV', udg_Unit)) ), ATTACK_TYPE_HERO, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_RazorEdgeTargets[GetForLoopIndexA()])
endfunction

function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_isRazorEdgeOn[GetForLoopIndexA()] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_RazorEdgeGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=7
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            if ( Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_Unit=udg_RazorEdgeCaster[GetForLoopIndexA()]
                set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
                set udg_Point2=udg_RazorEdgeEndLoc[GetForLoopIndexA()]
                if ( Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001Func004C() ) then
                    set udg_Point3=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point, 20.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_Point, udg_Point2))
                    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingLocBJ(udg_Unit, udg_Point3, udg_Point2)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point3)
                else
                    call SetUnitPathing(udg_Unit, true)
                    set udg_isRazorEdgeOn[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))]=false
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_Unit, udg_RazorEdgeGroup)
                    call GroupClear(udg_RazorEdgeTargets[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Unit)
                endif
                set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001Func005002003))
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001Func006A)
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Razor_Edge_Periodic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Razor_Edge_Periodic=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Razor_Edge_Periodic)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Razor_Edge_Periodic, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Razor_Edge_Periodic, function Trig_Razor_Edge_Periodic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Retreat
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Retreat_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Teams[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Retreat_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_activeRazorEdge[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=false
    call SetUnitPathing(GetTriggerUnit(), false)
    set udg_isRetreatOn[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=true
    set udg_RetreatCaster[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=GetTriggerUnit()
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_RetreatGroup)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_Retreat_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_RetreatEndLoc[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=Location(( GetLocationX(udg_Point) + 1000.00 ), GetLocationY(udg_Point))
    else
        set udg_RetreatEndLoc[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=Location(( GetLocationX(udg_Point) - 1000.00 ), GetLocationY(udg_Point))
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Retreat_Periodic)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Retreat takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Retreat=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Retreat, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Retreat, function Trig_Retreat_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Retreat Surface
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Retreat_Surface_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0DP', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Retreat_Surface_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0DP', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Retreat_Surface_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0DP', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Retreat_Surface_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_activeRazorEdge[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=true
    if ( Trig_Retreat_Surface_Func002C() ) then
    else
        if ( Trig_Retreat_Surface_Func002Func001C() ) then
        else
            if ( Trig_Retreat_Surface_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Retreat_Surface takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Retreat_Surface=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Retreat_Surface, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Retreat_Surface, function Trig_Retreat_Surface_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Retreat Periodic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Retreat_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_Point, udg_Point2) >= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Retreat_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_isRetreatOn[GetForLoopIndexA()] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Retreat_Periodic_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_RetreatGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Retreat_Periodic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Retreat_Periodic_Func001C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=7
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            if ( Trig_Retreat_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_Unit=udg_RetreatCaster[GetForLoopIndexA()]
                set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
                set udg_Point2=udg_RetreatEndLoc[GetForLoopIndexA()]
                if ( Trig_Retreat_Periodic_Func001Func001Func001Func004C() ) then
                    set udg_Point3=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point, 20.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_Point, udg_Point2))
                    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingLocBJ(udg_Unit, udg_Point3, udg_Point2)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point3)
                else
                    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "unburrow")
                    call SetUnitPathing(udg_Unit, true)
                    set udg_isRetreatOn[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_Unit, udg_RetreatGroup)
                    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Unit)
                endif
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Retreat_Periodic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Retreat_Periodic=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Retreat_Periodic)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Retreat_Periodic, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Retreat_Periodic, function Trig_Retreat_Periodic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Termal Eruption
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_RoyalCommanders) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002Func004Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002Func004Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002Func004Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002Func004Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002Func004Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeThermalEruption[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A0AZ') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('A0AZ', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AZ', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("carrionswarm") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_RoyalCommanders)
    if ( Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002Func004Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "silence", udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Termal_Eruption takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Termal_Eruption=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Termal_Eruption, 1.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Termal_Eruption, Condition(function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Termal_Eruption, function Trig_AI_Termal_Eruption_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Aqua Burst
//===========================================================================

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Aqua_Burst_Func002Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Aqua_Burst_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Aqua_Burst_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeAquaBurst[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A0B0') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('A0B0', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0B0', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("silence") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Aqua_Burst_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_RoyalCommanders)
    if ( Trig_AI_Aqua_Burst_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Aqua_Burst_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Aqua_Burst_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Aqua_Burst_Func002Func004Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Aqua_Burst_Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "carrionswarm", udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Aqua_Burst takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Aqua_Burst=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Aqua_Burst, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Aqua_Burst, Condition(function Trig_AI_Aqua_Burst_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Aqua_Burst, function Trig_AI_Aqua_Burst_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: AI Curse of the Depth

        return false
    endif
    return true

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002Func004Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeCurseOfTheDepth[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A0B2') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('A0B2', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0B2', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_RoyalCommanders)
    if ( Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(650.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "doom", udg_Unit2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(650.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002Func004Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "doom", udg_Unit2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth, 1.30)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth, Condition(function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth, function Trig_AI_Curse_of_the_Depth_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Gust
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Gust_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_TideHunters) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Gust_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Gust_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Gust_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Gust_Func002Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Gust_Func002Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup4) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Gust_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Gust_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeGust[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A0AP') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Gust_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_TideHunters)
    if ( Trig_AI_Gust_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Gust_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Gust_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "shadowstrike", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup4=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Gust_Func002Func004Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Gust_Func002Func004Func002C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "shadowstrike", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup4))
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup4)
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Gust takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Gust=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Gust, 1.30)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Gust, Condition(function Trig_AI_Gust_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Gust, function Trig_AI_Gust_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Ravage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Ravage_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Ravage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not (false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeRavage[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A0AT') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Ravage_Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Ravage_Func004002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Ravage_Func004002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Ravage_Func004002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Ravage_Func004002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Ravage_Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Ravage_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Ravage_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Ravage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Ravage_Func004002003))
    if ( Trig_AI_Ravage_Func005C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "channel")
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Ravage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Ravage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Ravage, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Ravage, Condition(function Trig_AI_Ravage_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Ravage, function Trig_AI_Ravage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Healing Water
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_SunkenEmpresses) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func004Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func004Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func004Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func004Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func004Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeHealingWater[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A0AW') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('A0AW', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AW', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("cloudoffog") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("monsoon") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_SunkenEmpresses)
    if ( Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(550.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func004Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "impale", udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Healing_Water takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Healing_Water=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Healing_Water, 1.20)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Healing_Water, Condition(function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Healing_Water, function Trig_AI_Healing_Water_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

endfunction

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Monsoon_Func002Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Monsoon_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Monsoon_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeMist[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A097') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('A097', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A097', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("cloudoffog") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Monsoon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_SunkenEmpresses)
    if ( Trig_AI_Monsoon_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(800.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Monsoon_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Monsoon_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Monsoon_Func002Func004Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Monsoon_Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "monsoon", udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

    set gg_trg_AI_Monsoon=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Monsoon, 1.00)

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Monsoon, function Trig_AI_Monsoon_Actions)

        return false

        return false
    endif

            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Mist_Func002Func004Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Mist_Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "cloudoffog", udg_Point2)
            else
            endif

            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
        endif

        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)

//===========================================================================
