    set gg_trg_AI_Mist=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Mist, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Mist, Condition(function Trig_AI_Mist_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Mist, function Trig_AI_Mist_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Frenzy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Frenzy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "berserk")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Frenzy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Frenzy=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Frenzy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Frenzy, function Trig_AI_Frenzy_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Retreat
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Retreat_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 35.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetTriggerUnit(), 'A0DP') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_activeRetreat[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Retreat_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "burrow")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Retreat takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Retreat=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Retreat, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Retreat, Condition(function Trig_AI_Retreat_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Retreat, function Trig_AI_Retreat_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Razor Edge
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_MyrmidonCommanders) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002Func004Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002Func004Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002Func004Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002Func004Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002Func004Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeRazorEdge[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A0AV') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Unit) >= I2R(BlzGetAbilityManaCost('A0AV', GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AV', udg_Unit))) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit, 'B02V') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_MyrmidonCommanders)
    if ( Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(550.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002Func004Func002002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Func002Func004Func003C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Unit, "carrionswarm", udg_Point2)
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Razor_Edge takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Razor_Edge=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Razor_Edge, 1.20)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Razor_Edge, Condition(function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Razor_Edge, function Trig_AI_Razor_Edge_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Hunter Instincts
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_MyrmidonCommanders) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Func002Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Func002Func005002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Func002Func005002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Func002Func005002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Func002Func005002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Func002Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Func002Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Func002Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeHunterInstinct[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(udg_Unit, 'A0AY') <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit, 'B02V') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_MyrmidonCommanders)
    if ( Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Func002Func005002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Func002Func006C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "windwalk")
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Hunter_Instincts takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Hunter_Instincts=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Hunter_Instincts, 1.20)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Hunter_Instincts, Condition(function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Hunter_Instincts, function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Hunter Instincts 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_MyrmidonCommanders) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func002Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func002Func002002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd' )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func002Func002002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func002Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd'), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd'), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd'), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'ushd'), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HunterInstinctsUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Unit, 'B02V') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HunterInstinctsUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] != null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_MyrmidonCommanders)
    if ( Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_HunterInstinctsUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))]=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Func003C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "attack", udg_HunterInstinctsUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2, function Trig_AI_Hunter_Instincts_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hunter Instincts Unit Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hunter_Instincts_Unit_Dies_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_HunterInstinctsUnit[7] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_HunterInstinctsUnit[8] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_HunterInstinctsUnit[9] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_HunterInstinctsUnit[10] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_HunterInstinctsUnit[11] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_HunterInstinctsUnit[12] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Hunter_Instincts_Unit_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Hunter_Instincts_Unit_Dies_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hunter_Instincts_Unit_Dies_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_HunterInstinctsUnit[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hunter_Instincts_Unit_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=7
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Hunter_Instincts_Unit_Dies_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_HunterInstinctsUnit[GetForLoopIndexA()]=null
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hunter_Instincts_Unit_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hunter_Instincts_Unit_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Hunter_Instincts_Unit_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hunter_Instincts_Unit_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Hunter_Instincts_Unit_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hunter_Instincts_Unit_Dies, function Trig_Hunter_Instincts_Unit_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Myrmidon Commander Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Myrmidon_Commander_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_HunterInstinctsUnit[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=null
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Myrmidon_Commander_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Myrmidon_Commander_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Myrmidon_Commander_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Myrmidon_Commander_Dies, function Trig_Myrmidon_Commander_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Typhoon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Typhoon_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeTyphoon[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Typhoon_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeTyphoon[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Typhoon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_AI_Typhoon_Func001C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetAttacker(), "cyclone", GetTriggerUnit())
    else
        if ( Trig_AI_Typhoon_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "cyclone", GetAttacker())
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Typhoon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Typhoon=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Typhoon, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Typhoon, function Trig_AI_Typhoon_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Mending Water
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Mending_Water_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Summoners) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Mending_Water_Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Mending_Water_Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Mending_Water_Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Mending_Water_Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Mending_Water_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) <= 90.00), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Mending_Water_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Mending_Water_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeMendingWater[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Mending_Water_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Summoners)
    if ( Trig_AI_Mending_Water_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Mending_Water_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Mending_Water_Func002Func003C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "healingwave", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Mending_Water takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Mending_Water=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Mending_Water, 0.70)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Mending_Water, Condition(function Trig_AI_Mending_Water_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Mending_Water, function Trig_AI_Mending_Water_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Madness
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Madness_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Swellers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02F') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02F') == false), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02F') == false), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func003Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02F') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02F') == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func003Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_Unit2) != 'ushd' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("acidbomb") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Madness_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeMadness[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Madness_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Swellers)
    if ( Trig_AI_Madness_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "unholyfrenzy", udg_Unit2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func003Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func003Func002C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                if ( Trig_AI_Madness_Func003Func003Func002Func002C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "unholyfrenzy", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Madness takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Madness=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Madness, 0.55)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Madness, Condition(function Trig_AI_Madness_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Madness, function Trig_AI_Madness_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Water Shield
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Swellers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B003') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B003') == false), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B003') == false), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func003Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B003') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B003') == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func003Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_Unit2) != 'ushd' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeWaterShield[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("frostarmor") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Swellers)
    if ( Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "frostarmor", udg_Unit2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func003Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                if ( Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Func002Func003Func002Func002C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "frostarmor", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Water_Shield takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Water_Shield=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Water_Shield, 0.55)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Water_Shield, Condition(function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Water_Shield, function Trig_AI_Water_Shield_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Suffocate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Swellers) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02G') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02G') == false), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02G') == false), (GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func003Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func003Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02G') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func003Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02G') == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02G') == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func003Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(udg_Unit) != String2OrderIdBJ("unholyfrenzy") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSuffocate[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_Swellers)
    if ( Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "cripple", udg_Unit2)
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func003Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Suffocate_Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2)
                if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "cripple", udg_Unit2)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Suffocate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Suffocate=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Suffocate, 0.70)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Suffocate, Condition(function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Suffocate, function Trig_AI_Suffocate_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Devour
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Devour_Func001Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Devour_Func001Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Devour_Func001Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Devour_Func001Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Devour_Func001Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Devour_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Devour_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeDevourNaga[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Devour_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GetEnumUnit()
    if ( Trig_AI_Devour_Func001Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Devour_Func001Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Devour_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Unit2=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "devour", udg_Unit2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Devour_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_DragonTurtles, function Trig_AI_Devour_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Devour takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Devour=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Devour, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Devour, function Trig_AI_Devour_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_NagaMyrmidons) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02M') == false )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02M') == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02M') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func001002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func001002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02M') == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02M') == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitLevel(GetFilterUnit()) > 3)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func002Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func002Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02M') == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func002Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func002Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02M') == false), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func002Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B02M') == false), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup3) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeMendingWater[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_NagaMyrmidons)
    if ( Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "ensnare", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
        else
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func001002003))
            if ( Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "ensnare", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
            else
                set udg_UnitGroup3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(750.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func002Func001002003))
                if ( Trig_AI_Crystalized_Func002Func003Func002Func002C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Unit, "ensnare", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup3))
                else
                endif
                call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup3)
            endif
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Crystalized takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Crystalized=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Crystalized, 0.70)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Crystalized, Condition(function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Crystalized, function Trig_AI_Crystalized_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Submerge
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Submerge_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_NagaMyrmidons) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func003Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func003Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func003Func001002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n024' )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func003Func001002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n01Z' )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func003Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n024'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n01Z')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n024'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n01Z')))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit)) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n024'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n01Z')))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func003Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSubmerge[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func003Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "burrow")
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_activeSubmerge[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_NagaMyrmidons)
    if ( Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(2000.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func003Func001002003))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup2, function Trig_AI_Submerge_Func002Func003Func002A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Submerge takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Submerge=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Submerge, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Submerge, Condition(function Trig_AI_Submerge_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Submerge, function Trig_AI_Submerge_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Submerge OnCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnCast_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not (false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnCast_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( ModuloInteger(GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), 2) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_NagaMyrmidons)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_SubmergedGroup)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_AI_Submerge_OnCast_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Fortress_Team_1)
        set udg_Real=DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_Point, udg_Point2)
        set udg_Point3=OffsetLocation(udg_Point, udg_Real, 0)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
    else
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Fortress_Team_2)
        set udg_Real=DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_Point, udg_Point2)
        set udg_Point3=OffsetLocation(udg_Point, ( 0.00 - udg_Real ), 0)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
    endif
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_Point3)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point3)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Submerge_OnCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Submerge_OnCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Submerge_OnCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Submerge_OnCast, Condition(function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Submerge_OnCast, function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Submerge Scan
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_SubmergedGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func003Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func003Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func003Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func003Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func003Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func003C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "unburrow")
    else
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(350.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func003Func001002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001Func003Func002C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "unburrow")
        else
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_SubmergedGroup, function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Submerge_Scan takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Submerge_Scan=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Submerge_Scan, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Submerge_Scan, Condition(function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Submerge_Scan, function Trig_AI_Submerge_Scan_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Submerge OnSurface
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnSurface_Func006002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnSurface_Func006002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnSurface_Func006002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnSurface_Func006002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnSurface_Func006002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnSurface_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 50.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnSurface_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_SubmergedGroup)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_NagaMyrmidons)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Naga\\NagaDeath\\NagaDeath.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(275.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnSurface_Func006002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnSurface_Func007A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Submerge_OnSurface takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Submerge_OnSurface=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_AI_Submerge_OnSurface, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Submerge_OnSurface, function Trig_AI_Submerge_OnSurface_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Place Racial Building
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Place_Racial_Building_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Place_Racial_Building_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not (false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Place_Racial_Building_Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Teams[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetLocationX(udg_Point) < 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Place_Racial_Building_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Teams[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetLocationX(udg_Point) > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Place_Racial_Building_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Defensive_Structure_Area, udg_Point) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Place_Racial_Building_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    if ( Trig_Place_Racial_Building_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Place_Racial_Building_Func003Func001C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(GetSpellAbilityId(), GetTriggerUnit())
        else
            if ( Trig_Place_Racial_Building_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(GetSpellAbilityId(), GetTriggerUnit())
            else
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "stop")
                call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), "TRIGSTR_6191")
            endif
        endif
    else
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "stop")
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), "TRIGSTR_6090")
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Place_Racial_Building takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Place_Racial_Building=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Place_Racial_Building, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Place_Racial_Building, Condition(function Trig_Place_Racial_Building_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Place_Racial_Building, function Trig_Place_Racial_Building_Actions)
endfunction

    return false
endfunction

    if ( not (false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Move_Racial_Building=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Move_Racial_Building, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Move_Racial_Building, Condition(function Trig_Move_Racial_Building_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Racial_Building, function Trig_Move_Racial_Building_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Racial Building Prevent
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not (false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent_Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Teams[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetLocationX(udg_Point) < 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Teams[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetLocationX(udg_Point) > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Defensive_Structure_Area, udg_Point) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    if ( Trig_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent_Func003Func001C() ) then
        else
            if ( Trig_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
            else
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "stop")
                call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), "TRIGSTR_6617")
            endif
        endif
    else
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "stop")
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), "TRIGSTR_6618")
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent, Condition(function Trig_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent, function Trig_Move_Racial_Building_Prevent_Actions)
endfunction

    return false
endfunction

    if ( not (false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dalaran_Tower_Finish_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dalaran_Tower_Finish_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dalaran_Tower_Finish_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dalaran_Tower_Finish_Func002C() ) then
    else
        if ( Trig_Dalaran_Tower_Finish_Func002Func001C() ) then
        else
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), "TRIGSTR_6296")
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Wrath of The Phoenix
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Phoenixes) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Func001Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Func001Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Func001Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Func001Func003Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Func001Func003Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Func001Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Func001Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup2) > 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_UnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Func001Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Func001Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
        set udg_UnitGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_Point2, Condition(function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Func001Func003Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "unstableconcoction", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup2))
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup2)
    else
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Phoenixes, function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix, Condition(function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix, function Trig_AI_Wrath_of_The_Phoenix_Actions)
endfunction
