//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon Hero Builder
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetResearched() == 'R00J' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetResearched() == 'R00K' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetResearched() == 'R00L' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetResearched() == 'R00M' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Func010C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(udg_BuildRegion[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))])
    if ( Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Func004C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
    endif
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
    else
    endif
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
    else
    endif
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
    else
    endif
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
    else
    endif
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectCaster.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summon_Hero_Builder takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summon_Hero_Builder=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Summon_Hero_Builder, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Summon_Hero_Builder, Condition(function Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_Hero_Builder, function Trig_Summon_Hero_Builder_Actions)
endfunction

    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H01F' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H01I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H01J' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H01L' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func008Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N012' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N013' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N014' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N015' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N016' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N017' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N018' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N019' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func008Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00E' )
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func008Func005002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00L' )
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func008Func005002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00F' )
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func008Func005002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00G' )
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func008Func005002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00F'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00G')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func008Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00L'), (GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00F'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00G')))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func008Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00E'), (GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00L'), (GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00F'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00G')))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Construct_Hero_Func008Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func009Func006002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e012' )
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not (false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func010Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func010Func006002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e013' )
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not (false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func011Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func011Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e016' )
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not (false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func012Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func012Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e017' )
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not (false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TotalHeroes[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TotalHeroes[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TotalHeroes[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018Func001Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TotalHeroes[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TotalHeroes[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TotalHeroes[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_isGameModeClassic == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_isMMDEnabled == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Construct_Hero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TotalHeroes[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=( udg_TotalHeroes[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] + 1 )
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func004C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func004Func006002003))
        call RemoveUnit(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func005C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Reincarnation\\ReincarnationTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func005Func004002003))
        call RemoveUnit(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func006C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func006Func005002003))
        call RemoveUnit(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func007C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\NEDeathSmall\\NEDeathSmall.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func007Func004002003))
        call RemoveUnit(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func008C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Demon\\DarkPortal\\DarkPortalTarget.mdl")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func008Func005002003))
        call RemoveUnit(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func009C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func009Func006002003))
        call RemoveUnit(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func010C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func010Func006002003))
        call RemoveUnit(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func011C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func011Func004002003))
        call RemoveUnit(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func012C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Naga\\NagaDeath\\NagaDeath.mdl")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Construct_Hero_Func012Func004002003))
        call RemoveUnit(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_UnitGroup))
    else
    endif
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()), false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call BuildHero()
    // MMD values
    if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018Func001Func002C() ) then
                call MMD_UpdateValueString("Round " + I2S(udg_TotalRounds) + " Hero 1" , GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) , LoadStr(udg_MMD_HeroNamesTable, GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()), 0))
            else
                if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                    call MMD_UpdateValueString("Round " + I2S(udg_TotalRounds) + " Hero 2" , GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) , LoadStr(udg_MMD_HeroNamesTable, GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()), 0))
                else
                    if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018Func001Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call MMD_UpdateValueString("Round " + I2S(udg_TotalRounds) + " Hero 3" , GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) , LoadStr(udg_MMD_HeroNamesTable, GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()), 0))
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018Func001Func001C() ) then
                call MMD_UpdateValueString("Custom Round " + I2S(udg_TotalRounds) + " Hero 1" , GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) , LoadStr(udg_MMD_HeroNamesTable, GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()), 0))
            else
                if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call MMD_UpdateValueString("Custom Round " + I2S(udg_TotalRounds) + " Hero 2" , GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) , LoadStr(udg_MMD_HeroNamesTable, GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()), 0))
                else
                    if ( Trig_Construct_Hero_Func018Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call MMD_UpdateValueString("Custom Round " + I2S(udg_TotalRounds) + " Hero 3" , GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) , LoadStr(udg_MMD_HeroNamesTable, GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()), 0))
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Construct_Hero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Construct_Hero=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Construct_Hero, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_CONSTRUCT_START)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Construct_Hero, Condition(function Trig_Construct_Hero_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Construct_Hero, function Trig_Construct_Hero_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Building Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Building_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Building_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call ReviveHeroLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Point, false)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Building_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Building_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Hero_Building_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hero_Building_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Hero_Building_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_Building_Dies, function Trig_Hero_Building_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Building Set Mana Zero
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Building_Set_Mana_Zero_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Building_Set_Mana_Zero_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Hero_Building_Set_Mana_Zero_Func001Func001C() ) then
        call BlzSetUnitMaxMana(GetEnumUnit(), 0)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Building_Set_Mana_Zero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroBuildings, function Trig_Hero_Building_Set_Mana_Zero_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Building_Set_Mana_Zero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Building_Set_Mana_Zero=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Hero_Building_Set_Mana_Zero, 10.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_Building_Set_Mana_Zero, function Trig_Hero_Building_Set_Mana_Zero_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Building
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Building_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00Z' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A011' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A01A' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Building_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Move_Building_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Building_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(udg_BuildRegion[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_Point) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Building_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_Move_Building_Func004C() ) then
        call ClearSelectionForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Point)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Polymorph\\PolyMorphDoneGround.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point2, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Polymorph\\PolyMorphDoneGround.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "stop")
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), "TRIGSTR_1385")
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Move_Building takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Move_Building=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Move_Building, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Move_Building, Condition(function Trig_Move_Building_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Building, function Trig_Move_Building_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sell Building 100
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sell_Building_100_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sell_Building_100_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( GetLocalPlayer() == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) ) then
    call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ(gg_snd_ReceiveGold, 100, GetTriggerUnit())
    endif
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "UI\\Feedback\\GoldCredit\\GoldCredit.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call UnitSell(1.00)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sell_Building_100 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sell_Building_100=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sell_Building_100, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sell_Building_100, Condition(function Trig_Sell_Building_100_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sell_Building_100, function Trig_Sell_Building_100_Actions)
endfunction

    call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ(gg_snd_ReceiveGold, 100, GetTriggerUnit())
    endif
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "UI\\Feedback\\GoldCredit\\GoldCredit.mdl")

    call UnitSell(0.75)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Build_Raider takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Build_Raider=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Build_Raider, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_CONSTRUCT_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Build_Raider, Condition(function Trig_Build_Raider_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Build_Raider, function Trig_Build_Raider_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Basic Income
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Basic_Income_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(2, GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    set udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=( udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] + 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Basic_Income_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Basic_Income_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Basic_Income takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Basic_Income=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Basic_Income)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Basic_Income, 0.40)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Basic_Income, function Trig_Basic_Income_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Extra Income
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Extra_Income_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(( udg_GoldExtractorNumber[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] + udg_MiddleIncome[1] ), GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    set udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=( udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] + ( udg_GoldExtractorNumber[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] + udg_MiddleIncome[1] ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Extra_Income_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(( udg_GoldExtractorNumber[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] + udg_MiddleIncome[2] ), GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    set udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=( udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] + ( udg_GoldExtractorNumber[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())] + udg_MiddleIncome[2] ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Extra_Income_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(udg_Teams[1], function Trig_Extra_Income_Func001A)
    call ForForce(udg_Teams[2], function Trig_Extra_Income_Func002A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Extra_Income takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Extra_Income=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Extra_Income)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Extra_Income, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Extra_Income, function Trig_Extra_Income_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gold Extractor Add
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A010' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A013' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A014' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A015' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func001Func002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h01B' )
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func001Func002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func001Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h01B'), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzUnitHideAbility(GetEnumUnit(), 'A010', true)
    call BlzUnitHideAbility(GetEnumUnit(), 'A013', false)
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A010' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func002Func002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h01B' )
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func002Func002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func002Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h01B'), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func002Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzUnitHideAbility(GetEnumUnit(), 'A013', true)
    call BlzUnitHideAbility(GetEnumUnit(), 'A014', false)
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A013' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func003Func002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h01B' )
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func003Func002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func003Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h01B'), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func003Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzUnitHideAbility(GetEnumUnit(), 'A014', true)
    call BlzUnitHideAbility(GetEnumUnit(), 'A015', false)
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A014' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func004Func002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h01B' )
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func004Func002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func004Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h01B'), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func004Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzUnitHideAbility(GetEnumUnit(), 'A015', true)
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A015' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func023C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A010' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func024C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A013' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func025C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A014' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func026C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A015' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GoldExtractorCooldownBoolean[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) >= udg_GoldExtractorCost[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=( udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] - 150 )
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func001Func002002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func001Func003A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func002C() ) then
            set udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=( udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] - 225 )
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func002Func002002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func002Func003A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=( udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] - 300 )
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func003Func002002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func003Func003A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=( udg_TotalGoldEarned[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] - 375 )
            set udg_UnitGroup=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func004Func002002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_UnitGroup, function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func004Func003A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_UnitGroup)
        else
        endif
        set udg_GoldExtractorCost[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=( udg_GoldExtractorCost[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] + 75 )
        set udg_GoldExtractorCooldownBoolean[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=true
        set udg_GoldExtractorNumber[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=( udg_GoldExtractorNumber[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] + 1 )
        set udg_IncomeNoMiddleText[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=I2S(( 100 + ( 10 * udg_GoldExtractorNumber[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] ) ))
        set udg_IncomeMiddleText[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=( "|cff00ff00" + ( I2S(( 110 + ( 10 * udg_GoldExtractorNumber[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] ) )) + "|r" ) )
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GoldExtractorCooldown[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], false, 90.00)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\FeralSpirit\\feralspirittarget.mdl")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 3.00)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( "Cooldown: " + I2S(R2I(TimerGetRemaining(udg_GoldExtractorCooldown[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]))) ), udg_Point, 20.00, 10.00, 100, 25.00, 0.00, 0)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.50)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        if ( Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func023C() ) then
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(150, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func024C() ) then
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(225, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func025C() ) then
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(300, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Func002Func026C() ) then
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(375, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gold_Extractor_Add takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gold_Extractor_Add=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Gold_Extractor_Add, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Gold_Extractor_Add, Condition(function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Gold_Extractor_Add, function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Add_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gold Extractor Cooldown Expires
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Cooldown_Expires_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_GoldExtractorCooldown[GetForLoopIndexA()]) <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Cooldown_Expires_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Gold_Extractor_Cooldown_Expires_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_GoldExtractorCooldownBoolean[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gold_Extractor_Cooldown_Expires takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gold_Extractor_Cooldown_Expires=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Gold_Extractor_Cooldown_Expires, udg_GoldExtractorCooldown[1])
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Gold_Extractor_Cooldown_Expires, udg_GoldExtractorCooldown[2])
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Gold_Extractor_Cooldown_Expires, udg_GoldExtractorCooldown[3])
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Gold_Extractor_Cooldown_Expires, udg_GoldExtractorCooldown[4])
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Gold_Extractor_Cooldown_Expires, udg_GoldExtractorCooldown[5])
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Gold_Extractor_Cooldown_Expires, udg_GoldExtractorCooldown[6])
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Gold_Extractor_Cooldown_Expires, function Trig_Gold_Extractor_Cooldown_Expires_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Team 1 Enters Middle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Team_1_Enters_Middle_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Team_1_Enters_Middle_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Team_1_Enters_Middle_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team_1_Enters_Middle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_UnitsOnEnemyHalf[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Team_1_Enters_Middle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Team_1_Enters_Middle=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Team_1_Enters_Middle, gg_rct_Middle_Team_2)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Team_1_Enters_Middle, Condition(function Trig_Team_1_Enters_Middle_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Team_1_Enters_Middle, function Trig_Team_1_Enters_Middle_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Team 2 Enters Middle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Team_2_Enters_Middle_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Team_2_Enters_Middle_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Team_2_Enters_Middle_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team_2_Enters_Middle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_UnitsOnEnemyHalf[2])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
